['', ' Able to quickly visualize and profile data in tools like Tableau, PowerPivot, etc.', ' Strong business analysis capabilities; Ability to ask go beyond reporting and ask “why”; Strong drive to drill into data and uncover root causes. Strong ability to “tell stories” with data to business stakeholders, particularly stakeholders within our Finance and Controlling organizations. Work as part of an agile team, delivering reports and insights in an iterative manner with a “progress over perfection” mindset.', ' Able to parse different types of data (JSON, parquet, excel/csv) for analysis using tools like R or Python.', ' Strong business analysis capabilities; Ability to ask go beyond reporting and ask “why”; Strong drive to drill into data and uncover root causes.', ' Strong communication skills; Ability to engage with stakeholders on key business questions and hypotheses and tell compelling stories with data through visualization and reporting tools.', " Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Information Technology or Computer Science or equivalent professional experience; MBA or other graduate specialization in Finance and/or Accounting preferred", ' Work as part of an agile team, delivering reports and insights in an iterative manner with a “progress over perfection” mindset.', " Bachelor's degree in Information Systems, Information Technology or Computer Science or equivalent professional experience; MBA or other graduate specialization in Finance and/or Accounting preferred Solid SQL skills; ability to query data in a data warehouse and prepare data for reporting and insights automation needs. Experience with using Python/Pandas for data preparation/cleansing and analysis ideal but not required. Experience with a variety of reporting and data visualization tools; Tableau, Business Objects, and PowerPivot preferred. Proven track record building and automating reports, data visualizations and dashboards in a business context for a variety of stakeholders, from leadership oriented summary dashboards to more granular and detailed analyses. Strong communication skills; Ability to engage with stakeholders on key business questions and hypotheses and tell compelling stories with data through visualization and reporting tools. Automation mindset; Identify opportunities to automate insights generation work and ability to partner with Technology teams to implement solutions where possible. Experience working in an agile setting, working with developers to release in an iterative fashion. Experience working in a business setting; Experience working in a Corporate Finance and/or Controlling context and familiarity with key Finance terms, KPIs and typical reports strongly preferred.", ' Experience working in an agile setting, working with developers to release in an iterative fashion.', ' Experience working in a business setting; Experience working in a Corporate Finance and/or Controlling context and familiarity with key Finance terms, KPIs and typical reports strongly preferred.', ' Partner with stakeholders in Global Finance to identify key reports, business questions, hypotheses, and areas of exploration that will have a material impact on business decision-making, and translate these areas into requirements for insights, reports and data visualizations. Review, assess and automate the existing set of reports that are being run across Global Finance; Reports are run across a variety of tools, such as Business Objects, Excel and Tableau. Provide front-line support for data visualizations, dashboards and reports, answering user questions and resolving issues. Work with the Analytics Technology team to address back-end data or platform issues affecting reports.', ' Automation mindset; Identify opportunities to automate insights generation work and ability to partner with Technology teams to implement solutions where possible.', ' Strong SQL ability; able to write complex SQL queries against data warehouse/databases for the purposes of extracting required data and building data models for automated reporting and insights use case. Able to parse different types of data (JSON, parquet, excel/csv) for analysis using tools like R or Python. Able to quickly visualize and profile data in tools like Tableau, PowerPivot, etc.', ' Interact with many types of data in both SQL and non-SQL based environments. Parse data in common formats such as JSON, Parquet, excel/csv so that it can be usable for insights and analysis. Partner with the Converse Analytics Technology team to define data requirements and source data, either in terms of raw data or modeled data and logic to support insights, dashboard and report requirements.', ' Interact with many types of data in both SQL and non-SQL based environments.', ' Parse data in common formats such as JSON, Parquet, excel/csv so that it can be usable for insights and analysis.', ' Partner with stakeholders in Global Finance to identify key reports, business questions, hypotheses, and areas of exploration that will have a material impact on business decision-making, and translate these areas into requirements for insights, reports and data visualizations.', 'Qualifications', ' Solid SQL skills; ability to query data in a data warehouse and prepare data for reporting and insights automation needs. Experience with using Python/Pandas for data preparation/cleansing and analysis ideal but not required.', ' Partner with the Converse Analytics Technology team to define data requirements and source data, either in terms of raw data or modeled data and logic to support insights, dashboard and report requirements.', ' Review, assess and automate the existing set of reports that are being run across Global Finance; Reports are run across a variety of tools, such as Business Objects, Excel and Tableau.', ' Experience with a variety of reporting and data visualization tools; Tableau, Business Objects, and PowerPivot preferred. Proven track record building and automating reports, data visualizations and dashboards in a business context for a variety of stakeholders, from leadership oriented summary dashboards to more granular and detailed analyses.', ' Provide front-line support for data visualizations, dashboards and reports, answering user questions and resolving issues. Work with the Analytics Technology team to address back-end data or platform issues affecting reports.', ' Strong SQL ability; able to write complex SQL queries against data warehouse/databases for the purposes of extracting required data and building data models for automated reporting and insights use case.', ' Strong ability to “tell stories” with data to business stakeholders, particularly stakeholders within our Finance and Controlling organizations.']

Our team delivers unique enterprise-wide IT solutions in cutting-edge technologies such as mobility, telematics, mission-critical business systems, supercomputing, cloud, vehicle engineering and real-time computing. ['', 'Excellent organizational and analytical abilities.', "Nomi Health is led by Mark Newman (Founder/CEO) , Josh Walker (Co-Founder, COO) and Boe Hartman (Co-Founder, CTO). Both Mark, Josh and Boe have a proven track record in the HR Tech, Health Tech, Health plans, Pharmacy and Financial Service industries. Mark, previously Founder/CEO of HireVue where he scaled the company from 0 to $40m ARR with a successful exit of over $500M. Josh, comes with 18+ years of experience in healthcare as COO at Imagine Health, Upwell and OptumInsight where he has first-hand experience in international and domestic healthcare markets leading and expanding business growth. Boe has served in multiple senior positions across global banking for over 25 years.\xa0Most recently, at Goldman Sachs as a Partner, where he led the firm’s launch of it’s digital consumer bank; Marcus By Goldman Sachs and the firm's entry into the consumer credit card market.", 'Chief Technology Officer', 'Requirements', 'Defining technical standards and guidelines. Assess and document when and how to use the architected producers and consumers, the technologies to be used for various purposes, and models of selected entities, objects and processes. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality.', 'Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved.', 'The company is in stealth mode right now and has raised over $10M in seed funding which will be used to hire and develop the product, technology and go-to-market team.\xa0', 'WHY IS THIS ROLE CRITICAL?', 'Nomi Health is the modern payment system for employee healthcare. We sidestep the middlemen, and connect employers providers and families directly at scale to cut healthcare costs by 30% across America. We will do this by eliminating high cost “out of network” charges, making the process all digital with easy access to real data and understandable actions.\xa0', 'Outstanding problem solver.', 'Benefits', 'Develop and implement data models to guide business decisions', 'Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency.', 'We are looking for a Data Science Engineer who can help pave the way for more work in the data field and start by analyzing our current needs and use data to generate value with Nomi Health’s end goal in mind. From this goal, you will design the architecture and the analytics pipelines while taking into account appropriate time frames, and costs.', 'Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Some views will use a database of extracted data and others will bring together data in near real time, considering data currency, availability, response times and data volumes. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation.', 'OK, HOW ABOUT A FEW SPECIFIC RESPONSIBILITIES?', 'Health, Dental, Vision, 401k with match, Commuter benefits with Great Pay, plus Equity.', 'Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi HealthDevelop and implement data models to guide business decisionsMapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. Documentation of a data source must describe the semantics of the data so that the occasional subtle differences in meaning are understood.Documenting interfaces and data movement by recording how mapped data is moved around the virtual enterprise. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations.Designing the movement of data through the enterprise, including sources of data and how the data is moved around in order to be improved.Defining integrative views of data to draw together data from across the enterprise. Some views will use a database of extracted data and others will bring together data in near real time, considering data currency, availability, response times and data volumes. Designing canonical data views to limit technical debt as data flows from point-to-point transformation.Defining technical standards and guidelines. Assess and document when and how to use the architected producers and consumers, the technologies to be used for various purposes, and models of selected entities, objects and processes. The guidelines should encourage reuse of existing data stores, as well as address issues of security, timeliness and quality.Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs).Leveraging existing [core] data assets.Managing related metadata to include business descriptions of the data, details of any calculations or summaries, descriptions of the sources of the data, and indications of data quality and currency.Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise.Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.', 'WHICH LEADER IS RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR GROWTH AND DEVELOPMENT?', 'Must have coding experience (python, JAVA, R),\xa0', 'Leveraging existing [core] data assets.', 'Must have ELT/ETL experience (Talend, MDM, other ETL/ELT tools)', '\ufeffNomi Health is offering a highly competitive compensation package with an attractive base salary as well as a significant equity stake into the company at an early stage.', 'Good written and verbal communication skills.', 'Mapping data sources, including descriptions of the business meaning of the data, its uses, its quality, the applications that maintain it and the database technology in which it is stored. Documentation of a data source must describe the semantics of the data so that the occasional subtle differences in meaning are understood.', 'WHO ARE WE?\xa0', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field.", 'Ensuring a focus on data quality by working effectively with data stewards so they can understand data semantics and identify opportunities for improving data quality.', 'A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role.', 'Data Science Engineer requirements are:', 'Familiarity of system concepts and tools within an enterprise architecture framework.', "Bachelor's degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering or relevant field.A minimum of 2-3 years experience in a similar role.Must have AWS or Azure experience. (Snowflake, Databricks, S3 desirable)Must have ELT/ETL experience (Talend, MDM, other ETL/ELT tools)Must have coding experience (python, JAVA, R),\xa0Familiarity of system concepts and tools within an enterprise architecture framework.Knowledge of various modern data formats, tools, and methodologies. (Infomatics desirable)Excellent organizational and analytical abilities.Outstanding problem solver.Good written and verbal communication skills.", 'Communicating the data architecture across the enterprise.', 'Must have AWS or Azure experience. (Snowflake, Databricks, S3 desirable)', 'Knowledge of various modern data formats, tools, and methodologies. (Infomatics desirable)', 'Documenting interfaces and data movement by recording how mapped data is moved around the virtual enterprise. This includes the frequency of movement, the source and destination of each step, how the data is transformed as it moves, and any aggregation or calculations.', 'Investigate and participate in emerging technologies and new release Proofs of Concept (PoCs).', 'WHAT IS A DAY IN THE LIFE?', 'As a Data Science Engineer you will provide technical and domain subject knowledge to the company and future customers. You should be able to know how to examine new data systems requirements and implement migration models. You will also spend a good deal of time problem solving, analyzing architecture and assessing architect models, reviewing data migrations, selecting platforms and on-boarding of data management solutions that meet the technical and operational needs of the business.\xa0You must be hands-on with tools and code.', 'Since we are early in our journey and we will be soon dealing with a lot of data, this person will set the stage for future work of data scientists and data engineers.\xa0', 'Contribute to the development of the ML capabilities for the Nomi Health']

['', 'Summary of Essential Duties and Responsibilities', 'The Data Engineer collaborates with a team of database and data engineering professionals, and has responsibility for analyzing, designing, building out, and maintaining Jones Day’s enterprise data architecture and extending a Data Management Program. The Data Engineer works with Application Development teams, business analysts, and subject matter experts from across the Firm to implement data management principles, integrate data across systems, map requirements and data flows elicited from business users, design and create data management procedures and tools, design and build appropriate data repositories (e.g., lakes, warehouses) and data analysis platforms, standardize enterprise reporting platforms, create efficient and effective data monitoring solutions, and otherwise serves as an integral member of the data architecture team.\xa0Communication, collaboration, lateral thinking, multi-tasking, and analytical acuity are essential for this role.', 'Required Qualifications: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum five years of work related experience including two years of experience in positions with similar levels of responsibility.', 'Summary of Essential Duties and Responsibilities: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0In-depth knowledge of Data Warehouse design, Data Lake strategies, SSAS, and related technologies and concepts.', 'Required', 'Jones Day is an Equal Opportunity Employer.\xa0', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0In-depth knowledge of T-SQL and Microsoft SQL Server.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Four year technical degree or equivalent work experience.', 'Qualifications: ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Expert level knowledge of Data Analysis Expressions.']

['', 'What you bring to Komodo:', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'The Life Science Services team’s mission is to support Life Science customers and products through custom applications of our healthcare map along with actionable insights that enable Komodo to meet our business goals.\xa0', 'Delivered high-value data analytics projects that existing data products cannot cover.', 'Keenly analytical mindset and the ability to solve complex problems with limited supervision.', 'High motivation, work ethic, and self-discipline to organize and complete tasks.', 'Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is required.Data processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery.Ability to work as part of a cross-functional collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Strong business acumen demonstrated by a good understanding of how analytics insights tie into business goals.Keenly analytical mindset and the ability to solve complex problems with limited supervision.High motivation, work ethic, and self-discipline to organize and complete tasks.', 'Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate self-service solutions to non-technical internal stakeholders.', 'Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery.', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. Komodo Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.', 'Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is required.', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.', 'We are looking for a Data Engineer to help scale analytics pipelines and complex logic for complicated data projects that solve common customer use cases, while working cross-functionally with Data Scientists, Customer and Product teams.\xa0', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Collaborated with data scientists to design, develop, and implement data data pipelines and data processing code for shared tooling.Worked with Product to help prototype new analytics offerings.Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate self-service solutions to non-technical internal stakeholders.Delivered high-value data analytics projects that existing data products cannot cover.Advocated for good engineering practices within the team via documentation and code reusability.', 'Collaborated with data scientists to design, develop, and implement data data pipelines and data processing code for shared tooling.', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Strong business acumen demonstrated by a good understanding of how analytics insights tie into business goals.', 'Worked with Product to help prototype new analytics offerings.', 'Advocated for good engineering practices within the team via documentation and code reusability.', 'Ability to work as part of a cross-functional collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.']

In fact, we’re a three-time winner of Modern Healthcare magazine’s Best Places to Work in Healthcare award.\xa0If you’re interested in consistent feedback and recognition, defined career paths, and the opportunity to work with driven and engaged colleagues in a dynamic industry, this may be the right opportunity for you.\xa0', '2+ years of experience in an operational Data\xa0Science\xa0role.\xa0', 'Navigate and use diverse machine learning stacks in Python\xa0and\xa0R\xa0', 'Mobile phone stipends and internet reimbursement', 'Phreesia is looking for an experienced and hands-on\xa0Data Scientist\xa0to join our growing Data Science Team; someone with extraordinary analytical and technical skills who is familiar with the entire lifecycle of a data science project, from data\xa0exploration,\xa0modeling\xa0and analysis,\xa0to\xa0model selection,\xa0validation,\xa0evaluation, and deployment.\xa0', 'MS/MA\xa0in\xa0a quantitative field such as\xa0data science,\xa0computer science, engineering,\xa0mathematics,\xa0statistics, computational linguistics, physics,\xa0or relevant equivalent professional experience\xa0', 'Nice to Have:', 'You will be joining a team of especially smart, humorous, quick-witted, and dedicated coworkers, all passionate about data and improving patient access to healthcare. ['Conexus AI, a San Francisco based data integration company, is seeking a (contract) software engineer familiar with Microsoft Visual Studio to develop an IDE plug-in for Visual Studio that wraps the functionality of a Conexus product currently deployed as an Amazon Web Service.\xa0The Conexus product performs static analysis of SQL program fragments, reporting errors and warnings to users, and as such must integrate with the parsing, intellisense, and other syntactic and semantic capabilities built-in to Visual Studio, as well as be placed for sale in the Microsoft marketplace.\xa0The primary pre-requisite for the role is an in-depth understanding of Microsoft Visual Studio extension, and the secondary prerequisite is knowledge of Microsoft’s SQL products and SQL itself.\xa0Estimated contract length: several months.\xa0Estimated salary: 100k.\xa0']

We’ve seen 347% customer growth in just one year, and now work with 2,000+ of the most innovative brands like Coach, Urban Outfitters, CB2, PacSun, Lulus, Party City, and Jack in the Box. Attentive was founded in 2016 by the co-founders of TapCommerce, a mobile marketing platform that was acquired by Twitter in 2014.', 'You deeply loathe regressions and take proactive steps to protect against them through a variety of testing techniques.', 'You are excited by new technologies but appreciate the cost of something new.', 'You are enthusiastic about the high impact, fast-paced work environment of an early stage startup', 'Robust health benefits packages including access to a 401k and various medical, dental and vision plans, and $100/month fitness reimbursement', 'Product Development at Attentive', 'We’re looking for a self-motivated, highly driven Software Engineer to bolster our development team. ['', 'Programming skills in Spark, Python, or similar programming languages', 'At Tandem, our employees are just as important as our customers! Not only do we hire the best, we reward, develop, and retain them too. At Tandem we offer competitive compensation packages, superb medical, dental and vision, a discounted stock purchasing plan, fitness discounts, generous PTO, casual work attire and more! For a full list of benefits please review our perks page at https://www.tandemdiabetes.com/careers/benefits.', '8 plus years of experience as a data engineer, through a combination of work experience and higher education', 'In addition to innovative technology, we have a culture that fosters the idea that the happiest people are the most productive people. We treat our fellow employees like friends and family, and the company like our own home. This universal respect allows us the freedom to be ourselves and to be effective at our jobs, knowing at the end of the day that we can trust everyone to do the right thing, for each other and for the company. You can learn more about our culture and life at tandem here:\xa0https://www.tandemdiabetes.com/careers/life-at-tandem and See what our customers are saying here: #tsliminthewild\xa0', 'Supports the team in the development and/or implementation of data products or models.', 'EXTRA AWESOME:', 'Build robust, fault-tolerant data pipelines', 'Partner with data scientists and data architects to operationalize machine learning models and algorithms', 'Other Responsibilities:', 'Knowledge of SQL and data warehousing', 'Lay the groundwork for data scientists to easily access data they need to research and prototype parallelizable models, algorithms, and visualizations', 'We love a good referral! If you know someone that would be a great fit for this position, please share!', 'Familiarity with Databricks is a plus', 'DIABETES IS ALL WE DO:', 'REFERRALS: ', 'Build monitoring infrastructure to give visibility into the data pipeline’s status and the impact of jobs on cluster performance', 'Provide subject matter expertise in data and software engineering', 'Partner with data scientists and data architects to operationalize machine learning models and algorithmsBuild robust, fault-tolerant data pipelinesBuild monitoring infrastructure to give visibility into the data pipeline’s status and the impact of jobs on cluster performanceLay the groundwork for data scientists to easily access data they need to research and prototype parallelizable models, algorithms, and visualizationsClean, consolidate, and process unstructured dataProvide subject matter expertise in data and software engineeringSupports the team in the development and/or implementation of data products or models.Attends industry and academic conferences to keep up to date with the state of technology.', 'Headquartered in San Diego with customers all over the world, Tandem Diabetes Care is dedicated to making the lives of people with diabetes better and better through relentless innovation. “In Tandem” means together, and we strive to embody that in every aspect of our business. Our offices are centrally located north of Downtown with easy access to the freeway.', 'Expert knowledge of software engineering, distributed computing, and cloud platforms', 'A DAY IN THE LIFE:', 'At Tandem, Diabetes is all we do. We are the makers of the only color, touch-screen insulin pump that is capable of remote feature updates and compatibility with continuous glucose monitoring. Read more about our company and check out our latest product features and capabilities here:\xa0t:slim X2™ Insulin Pump with Control-IQ™ Technology', 'The Data Science team at Tandem is tasked with empowering stakeholders to use data for better and faster decision making across all aspects of the business lifecycle. As a Data Engineer on the Tandem Data Science Team, you will use cloud technology to develop robust data pipelines and operationalize machine learning models and algorithms. This team member will use Tandem’s data assets to solve data-driven problems at scale, improve operational efficiency through forecasting and automation, and improve business outcomes.', 'Clean, consolidate, and process unstructured data', 'T-shaped: strong in data engineering, but also strong capabilities to deliver actionable results in a collaborative environment: excellent pragmatic problem solving, attention to detail, strong written and verbal communication skills, curiosity and a demonstrated ability to learn and grow new skills', 'Attends industry and academic conferences to keep up to date with the state of technology.', 'BA in computer science or other quantitative discipline', 'GROW WITH US:', 'YOU’RE AWESOME AT:', 'Experience deploying machine learning models and algorithms using cloud platforms', 'YOU’RE AWESOME AT', 'WHAT’S IN IT FOR YOU?', 'BA in computer science or other quantitative discipline8 plus years of experience as a data engineer, through a combination of work experience and higher educationExpert knowledge of software engineering, distributed computing, and cloud platformsExperience deploying machine learning models and algorithms using cloud platformsProgramming skills in Spark, Python, or similar programming languagesKnowledge of SQL and data warehousingT-shaped: strong in data engineering, but also strong capabilities to deliver actionable results in a collaborative environment: excellent pragmatic problem solving, attention to detail, strong written and verbal communication skills, curiosity and a demonstrated ability to learn and grow new skills']

", 'Working with Data Scientists to develop Data Pipelines with high performance Machine Learning algorithms such as Predictive Modelling, Clickstream Analytics and Natural Language Processing.', '- Experience with Terraform or AWS Cloud Formation scripting (or similar IaaC)', 'Experience in Java backend development', 'Constructing implementation design to efficiently decode the requirements and architect solution in AWS cloud environment.', '- Knowledgeable in SQL and no-SQL databases (such as Dynamo DB or Redshift)', 'Preferred, but not required qualifications:', 'Eventually, complete cloud/on-prem development utilizing Java Spring and Kafka data streaming technologies', 'Experience in Kafka for streaming data ', "Participating in AWS Architects' meeting to finalize the efficient design for the business requirements", '- Backend/Data Engineering experience using Python', 'Understanding the data volume, data retention and latency of the source datasets which would help in deciding the pipeline types (Batch, Micro-batch, Near Real time, and Real time)', 'Experience in Java backend developmentExperience in Kafka for streaming data Show-stopping communication and presenting skills ', 'Performing Unit Testing on scripts/jobs prepared for Data Ingestion, Curation and ETL pipelines.', 'Working with experts from different data source channels like Web, Mobile, Social Media and IVR to understand data collection and data storage processes', 'Developing Dynamic ETL solution for enabling SMEs to add/update/delete ETL Logics.', 'Implementing and supporting reporting and analytics infrastructure for connected teams.', "We're more specifically seeking an AWS ETL Data Engineer to to develop and maintain enterprise-level processing pipelines and data quality on AWS, build out ingestion paths for easier access of various types of data by data scientists, further improve extremely powerful infra to be accessed by data scientists/analysts, and lead the analytics platform buildout. This team will create automated ETL pipelines (with monitoring) using Python, Spark; develop E2E Data Pipelines for daily batches using AWS Glue Spark / Python Shell jobs from Web/Mobile channels into raw layer of AWS S3. This will also involve developing E2E Data Pipelines for streaming data using AWS Kinesis Data Streams/Firehose from Social Media and IVR channels into raw layer of AWS S3, developing curated jobs which include Data Cleansing, Data Wrangling and minimal data transformation from Raw AWS S3 to Curated AWS S3, and preparing ETL SQLs for populating the dimensional data model created in AWS Redshift Data Warehouse."]

['', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).', 'Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).', 'Empower Your Future. ['', 'The Senior Software Engineer, Automation Frameworks works in our fast-paced business environment under general direction, to design, develop, test, and deliver functioning software for computer-based systems and customer applications. The Product Developer II works with their team, mentors less experienced team members, and collaborates with members of other teams to plan and create value for the customer. This individual applies principles and techniques of computer science, engineering, mathematical analysis, and systems.Duties and Responsibilities:\uf0a7 Take ownership of the RAVE product when developing, maintaining, improving, testing, building, packaging, and releasing software\uf0a7 Design and implement test automation frameworks using tools such as Froglogic Squish\uf0a7 Demonstrate passion for continuous improvement\uf0a7 Identify work that has high and meaningful value\uf0a7 Understand and exhibit behavior in alignment with Agile and Lean principles\uf0a7 Have personal ownership for quality (i.e., do no harm)\uf0a7 Hold team members accountable for agreements made\uf0a7 Create new and update existing feature description, system test, product delivery, and process documentation\uf0a7 Perform unit test driven development (uTDD) and automated test-driven development (ATDD)\uf0a7 Provide guidance, cross-training, and support to team members\uf0a7 Provide realistic estimates and meet agreed upon commitments\uf0a7 Communicate with stakeholders, users, and/or customers when participating in, contributing to, and gaining approval for designs and specifications by example\uf0a7 Actively participate and engage in all meetings and ceremonies\uf0a7 Triage and resolve full-stack problems\uf0a7 Fix problems in the code base found in continuous integration\uf0a7 Contribute to the continuous delivery system (i.e., modify existing or create new test scripts, build or packaging architecture)\uf0a7 Write system level test plans\uf0a7 Execute software integration, system, and acceptance testing\uf0a7 Identify and recommend corrective action for procedural, product, and process deficiencies\uf0a7 Construct test fixtures, along with evaluating and using test equipment\uf0a7 Prepare and present technical material to stakeholders, the PMO, and customers\uf0a7 Adhere to organizational software development lifecycle (SDLC) procedures ']

['', 'The world is facing a medical crisis, bacteria are increasingly evolving resistance to even our strongest antibiotics.\xa0The problem is already very real and immediate; for example, bloodstream infection leading to sepsis is now responsible for more than half of all deaths in hospitals and is the most expensive condition treated in hospitals. Sepsis mortality rate increases >6% every hour without effective antibiotic treatment. Yet, despite the life and death urgency, and healthcare cost impacts, current methodologies require 3 days to determine the correct antibiotic.', 'Expert in R and proficient with C++ and Python.', 'MS degree in computer sciences, biomedical engineering, or related field and at least 5 years of interesting relevant experience.Expert in R and proficient with C++ and Python.Expertise in analytical methods and statistical analysis.Proficiency in SQL as well as NoSQL database technologies a plus.Full fluency (verbal and written) of the English language is a must.', 'The Job', 'The development and validation of applications for a medical instrument built under the guidance of a senior manager experienced in the application development discipline (so you’ll be learning the valuable skill of integrating your work into applications for medical diagnostic devices).', 'MS degree in computer sciences, biomedical engineering, or related field and at least 5 years of interesting relevant experience.', 'The application and development of suitable pre-processing, feature-selection and dimensional reduction techniques to detect, measure and account for data artifacts.', 'The Company', 'Proficiency in SQL as well as NoSQL database technologies a plus.', 'Expertise in analytical methods and statistical analysis.', 'Analytical methods and statistical analysis for processing high-volume, temporal high-dimensional data streams generated in real-time from our proprietary sensor technology.', 'This is not the job for a numbers only person. We want someone with a passion for and experience in the sciences that will lead you to look deeply into the sources of the data along with the scientists so that the data analysis is influenced by the science of our diagnostic technology and the science is influenced by the analysis.', 'You have a proven track record of successfully developing, validating and deploying data analysis and analytical methods to solve challenging real-world applications. You are deeply familiar with a broad range of analytical models and are at the pulse of developments in the field. Ideally you have proven expertise in the analysis of spatio-temporal data. You have a strong domain knowledge in the field of statistical analysis and signal processing. You should have a track record of success in your education and projects and have these characteristics and skills:', 'Specific Diagnostics has developed a breakthrough solution to rapidly determine the effective antibiotic treatment for bloodstream and other acute infections. Used for bloodstream infection Specific’s solution provides results 2 days sooner than existing methods, saving patients suffering from drug-resistant infection.\xa0', 'The development of data-driven visualization tools for the explorative analysis of high-dimensional data.', 'Analytical methods and statistical analysis for processing high-volume, temporal high-dimensional data streams generated in real-time from our proprietary sensor technology.The development of data-driven visualization tools for the explorative analysis of high-dimensional data.The application and development of suitable pre-processing, feature-selection and dimensional reduction techniques to detect, measure and account for data artifacts.The development and validation of applications for a medical instrument built under the guidance of a senior manager experienced in the application development discipline (so you’ll be learning the valuable skill of integrating your work into applications for medical diagnostic devices).Algorithm development for decisions and measurements from multi-dimensional data streams.', 'We have been funded by nearly $30 M in non-dilutive government sponsored research support and recently $17.5 M in venture capital. This is an opportunity to join us at an inflection point in our commercial growth as we bring our first key product to market and with recognition from major customers fueling an expansion of our staff.', 'This is the job for you if want to be where your ideas to be central to a world-changing and lifesaving product. Data science and analytics are at the core of our company we are seeking an exceptional talent to join our team. You will be a key contributor and critical to the success of the company. The main analysis tasks you are expected to contribute to are:', 'Full fluency (verbal and written) of the English language is a must.', 'You', 'Algorithm development for decisions and measurements from multi-dimensional data streams.']

['', 'Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, or Mesosphere, a plus', "Our Backend Software Engineer can expect to work with the latest backend technologies and programming languages. We provide equal employment opportunities to all employees and applicants of any type and do not discriminate based on race, color, religion, national origin, gender, age, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, genetic information or characteristic, gender identity and expression, veteran status, or other non-job related characteristics or other prohibited grounds specified in applicable federal, state, and local laws. Next's policy is to comply with all applicable laws related to nondiscrimination and equal opportunity and will not tolerate discrimination or harassment based on any of these characteristics. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation, and training.\xa0", '4+ years of proven experience in different types of OOP language, preferably in a JVM language (I.e, Java, Kotlin, Python, Scala, Groovy, Go, Clojure, and more)Experience with Docker, Kubernetes, or Mesosphere, a plusAWS experience (Kinesis, S3, Elastic Beanstalk)A profound understanding of design considerations (data structure choices, time vs. space tradeoffs)Hands-on development of concurrent / distributed systems, preferably cloud-basedStrong SQL skills, preferably with MySQLAs enthusiastic about programming as we areA team player with a positive spiritBSc in computer science or equivalent', 'Next is looking for explorers who are filled with curiosity, have the desire to travel the unbeaten path, and realize new heights in providing small business owners with the peace of mind to run their businesses. If you move fast, customer-focused, and willing to challenge the status quo, Next Insurance might just be your next journey.', "Our Backend Software Engineer can expect to work with the latest backend technologies and programming languages. We're big fans of server-side Kotlin and produce clean, testable code fast and push it into production several times a day via our CI / CD pipeline.You will work closely with other functional areas in the company - Product, Marketing, and our Front-end engineers in order to rapidly iterate on our product and find the best solutions to the challenges we face. You perform DVP&R according to customer requirements. You create test cases based on assigned requirements. You will participate in DFMEA reviews with support group to capture and reflect system changes of new generation of sensors. You are responsible for vehicle specific parameters in several customer projects. You are responsible for the flashing of ECU’s for application related work. You will trace analysis regular use of CAN and LIN interface tools such, Canoe, Canalyzer. You will interface with teams domestic and abroad. We are a company that values the well-being of our employees and we strive to cultivate a healthy and inclusive work culture. We offer a robust benefits package to our full-time employees, including:", 'Design solutions to complex customer-driven or end user-facing problems.', 'Work across different components of a complex engineering system, from frontend to backend to infrastructure.', 'This is a question many online platforms need to answer about their users. Our infrastructure runs on Google Cloud Platform and leverages Terraform and Kubernetes.Experience working at a small company with diverse responsibilities is a bonus, but not required.Interest and ability to learn additional frameworks and programming languages as needed.Experience working with the following: web application development, Unix/Linux environments, mobile application development, distributed and parallel systems, machine learning, networking, developing large software systems, and/or security engineering / software development.', 'Berbix is building identity verification and fraud deterrence as a service. Our infrastructure runs on Google Cloud Platform and leverages Terraform and Kubernetes.', '- 12 week, 100% paid parental leave for all new parents\xa0', 'Experience with general-purpose programming languages.', '- Monthly wellness allowance to spend on your mind and body', 'The Berbix product space is wide-ranging, with end user facing client code to collect ID information, backend systems to process that information, customer-facing dashboards to configure and consume the processed information, machine learning systems to intelligently reason about the information collected. You must be creative in solving hard problems in our high scale systems and unafraid to think out-of-the-box ', 'Shipping is powered by scalable and distributed services that integrate with whole of eBay (seller listing flow, Search, View Item detail, Cart/Checkout, post transaction selling view - label printing and tracking, returns, seller trust standards and marketing to name a few). This provides a real view on how the whole of eBay Product and Technology stack works.\xa0 ', 'View our privacy policy ', 'We are looking for self-motivated and talented individuals to join us to work on new products that will evolve and grow the eBay Core Shipping Product and Technology team.\xa0 ', '• Design and implement projects throughout all phases of the software development life cycle\xa0 ', 'EEO is the Law Poster ', "Shipping is one of eBay's core initiative responsible for delivering the world's greatest selection cheaply, conveniently and dependably. Shipping team is the driver for many key programs like: • eBay Plus: eBay's answer to Amazon prime in Germany.\xa0 ", 'EEO is the Law Poster Supplement', "Shipping Core Product and Technology domain is all based and operated from eBay's Seattle (Bellevue) center with full ownership and accountability, providing on-site long term sustained development and carrier growth. Shipping team works to solve highly technical and real-world problems, with cutting edge technologies, massively distributed environments, Big Data and machine learning that makes a real and immediate impact on one of the biggest social community of buyers and sellers.\xa0 ", 'This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to browse the site, you agree to our\xa0use of cookies ', "• Shipping Science: Uses big data and machine learning techniques to predict item's weight and dimension, simplifying the item listing flow for casual C2C sellers, predicts how soon a package will arrive powering key programs like Fast and Free.\xa0 ", '• Global Shipping Program: Responsible for expanding inventory to international buyers and seamlessly taking care of international shipping on behalf of sellers.\xa0 ', 'For more information see: ', '\xa0• Track business impact of features on a regular basis, and rely on data to make informed decisions about future directions\xa0 ', '• Click and Collect: Forming symbiotic relationships with other retailers (like Argos in UK, Woolworth in AU) to provide the ability to collect packages in time and place convenient to buyer.\xa0 ', '• Work with engineers and other cross functional teams including Research, Project Management, Quality Assurance, Operations etc. to develop great software that meets market needs with respect to functionality, reliability, performance, scalability ', 'eBay Inc. is an equal opportunity employer.\xa0 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, and disability, or other legally protected status.\xa0 If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at talent@ebay.com.\xa0 We will make every effort to respond to your request for disability assistance as soon as possible. ', '• The usual engineering activities - scoping, prioritizing, planning, bug fixing, site rollout, documentation, having fun\xa0 ']

['', 'More than anything, we seek engineers with strong coding fundamentals, a track record of high quality engineering, and a growth mindset and passion for learning. ['', "Familiarity with a user-centered design process and building for users' needs.", ' Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, or related field. 2+ years of professional experience (beyond class/hobby projects) working in any of the following programming languages: Android, C, C++, C#, JavaScript or Python. Demonstrated ability to write robust and re-usable code following best coding practices with proper documentation. Rapid prototyping skills using UI libraries, preferably across multiple platforms (particularly Android and web technologies). Experience creating back-end services and/or platforms that can be leveraged by user-facing applications and other services (NodeJS, Flask, etc.). ', 'ManpowerGroup is an Equal Opportunity Employer (EOE/AA)', ' ', "Responsibilities: Design, develop, and implement integrations with various data sources from across the enterprise  Analyze data sources and structure and develop and implement strategies for transformation and normalization of data needed to produce accurate reporting. This system will also be integrated with their workflow management and environment management tools to generate change requests and initiate autoprovisioning within their clouds. ['', 'ICA is proud to have been selected as the preferred partner to help a federal health agency develop mission-critical analytical tools. Many of these tools will leverage Machine Learning (ML) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) methods to identify safety signals in medical devices. This work is an opportunity to help improve the lives of millions of people using medical devices.', 'Requirements', 'Apply expertise in working with advanced analytics and data sciences', 'SQL, Python, and Spark', 'Development experience in any scripting language (Python, Perl, etc.)', 'International Consulting Associates, Inc., is a dynamic, fast-growing company providing management and technical solutions to help federal agencies tackle some of their most pressing challenges. Our team of diverse professionals leverages analytical expertise, a culture of entrepreneurial innovation, and an obsession with problem-solving to deliver practical and timely results for our clients. Specializing in research and data analysis, data analytics, and technical advisory services, ICA is looking for talented, like-minded people to join our growing team.', 'Comfort working as part of a dynamic team in a fast-paced environment, and able to effectively multitask with sometimes concurrent priorities', 'Role', 'BS in Computer Science, Math, Physics, Engineering, Statistics or related technical field or equivalent practical experience; Masters degree Preferred\xa0', 'Experience working with healthcare data is preferred', 'Data Scientist of a Product Team', 'Apply expertise in working with advanced analytics and data sciencesConduct exploratory analysisLeverage statistical, econometric, stochastic, operations research, predictive modeling, simulation, optimization (linear, mixed integer, constraint programming), and/or machine learning analytics techniquesUtilize tools/programming languages including SQL, Python, and SparkFind ways to solve business problems with dataFormulate mathematical approaches and gather data to solve those problems, develop, analyze/draw conclusions, test solutions and present to the clientClearly and effectively communicate complex analytic concepts and solutions both internally (to teammates) and externally (to the client)', 'As a Data Scientist of a Product Team, you analyze data and build models to predict signals. You will use NLP techniques to extract value from free text. You will be a part of a Scrum team of developers that includes other data scientists, machine learning engineers, and full stack and data visualization developers. If you like learning new technologies, solving tough problems, and building systems that present millions of data points in a web browser, ICA could be the right place for you.\xa0\xa0', 'Conduct exploratory analysis', 'Formulate mathematical approaches and gather data to solve those problems, develop, analyze/draw conclusions, test solutions and present to the client', 'BS in Computer Science, Math, Physics, Engineering, Statistics or related technical field or equivalent practical experience; Masters degree Preferred\xa03+ years of industry experience in Data Science and/or Machine Learning fieldBig data and predictive modellingDevelopment experience in any scripting language (Python, Perl, etc.)Experience communicating the results of analyses with product and leadership teams to influence the strategy of the productKnowledge of statistics (e.g. hypothesis testing, regressions)Experience manipulating data sets through statistical software (e.g. R, SAS) or other methodsComfort working as part of a dynamic team in a fast-paced environment, and able to effectively multitask with sometimes concurrent prioritiesAbility to to communicate complex information simply and clearly, both orally and in writingExperience working with healthcare data is preferredThis project requires personnel to obtain a Public Trust Clearance. To be eligible, candidates must be US Citizens or have lived in the US for 3 of the past 5 years.', 'Experience manipulating data sets through statistical software (e.g. R, SAS) or other methods', 'Find ways to solve business problems with data', '3+ years of industry experience in Data Science and/or Machine Learning field', 'Clearly and effectively communicate complex analytic concepts and solutions both internally (to teammates) and externally (to the client)', 'Knowledge of statistics (e.g. hypothesis testing, regressions)', 'Leverage statistical, econometric, stochastic, operations research, predictive modeling, simulation, optimization (linear, mixed integer, constraint programming), and/or machine learning analytics techniques', 'Big data and predictive modelling', 'Experience communicating the results of analyses with product and leadership teams to influence the strategy of the product', 'Ability to to communicate complex information simply and clearly, both orally and in writing', 'Utilize tools/programming languages including SQL, Python, and Spark', 'About Us', 'Responsibilities', 'This project requires personnel to obtain a Public Trust Clearance. To be eligible, candidates must be US Citizens or have lived in the US for 3 of the past 5 years.']

['', 'Own the full cycle of development from inception, design, development, testing, and production.', 'System software engineers at Dremio own the development of the infrastructure and services that power Dremio’s Data Lake Engine.', 'Responsibilities and Ownership:', 'Experience with database or query engine (e.g. Hive, Impala, Drill, Presto) internalsExperience with Apache Calcite is a plusKnowledge of query optimization techniques (e.g. volcano, cascade, cost-based optimization)Passion for quality, zero downtime upgrades, availability, resiliency, and uptime of the platformExcellent communication skills and affinity for collaboration and teamworkInterested in and motivated to be\xa0part of a fast-moving startup with a fun and accomplished teamStartup experience a plus', 'Dremio is the Data Lake Engine company. Our mission is to reshape the world of analytics to deliver on the promise of data with a fundamentally new architecture, purpose-built for the exploding trend towards cloud data lake storage such as AWS S3 and Microsoft ADLS. We dramatically reduce and even eliminate the need for the complex and expensive workarounds that have been in use for decades, such as data warehouses (whether on-premise or cloud-native), structural data prep, ETL, cubes, and extracts. We do this by enabling lightning-fast queries directly against data lake storage, combined with full self-service for data users and full governance and control for IT. The results for enterprises are extremely compelling: 100X faster time to insight; 10X greater efficiency; zero data copies; and game-changing simplicity. And equally compelling is the market opportunity for Dremio, as we are well on our way to disrupting a $25BN+ market.', 'Founded in 2015, Dremio is headquartered in Santa Clara, CA. Connect with Dremio on GitHub, LinkedIn, Twitter, and Facebook and visit https://www.dremio.com/careers/ for more information on the opportunities at Dremio.', 'Passion for quality, zero downtime upgrades, availability, resiliency, and uptime of the platform', 'Use modular design patterns to deliver an architecture that’s rooted in simplicity, that’s easy to iterate on and constantly evolve.', 'Interested in and motivated to be\xa0part of a fast-moving startup with a fun and accomplished team', 'Be Part Of Building The Future', 'If you, like us, say “bring it on” to exciting challenges that really do change the world (no BS), we have endless opportunities where you can make your mark.', 'Excellent communication skills and affinity for collaboration and teamwork', 'Understand and reason They also oversee all systems related to restaurant information, such as operating hours and menu items, and make sure that information is up to date and reliably propagated throughout our Grubhub marketplace. ['', 'Required Skills and Education ', ' test software capabilities using novel testing and analysis techniques; ', 'About BAE Systems Intelligence & Security ', ' support software development infrastructure and assist in building and configuring computer systems and resources; ', 'The Right Candidate Will Perform Software Engineering To Support', 'Job Description ', " data architectures;  software assurance and security;  conducting rapid software prototyping to demonstrate and evaluate technologies in relevant environments;  conducting performance, security, and other aspects of evaluating software systems;  test software capabilities using novel testing and analysis techniques;  document software with an emphasis on architectures, user stories, and interface definitions;  practice Agile software development methods;  actively participate on teams of software developers, researchers, designers and tech leads;  support software development infrastructure and assist in building and configuring computer systems and resources;  interface with the technical community and other Government entities to understand challenges, needs, and develop solutions; and  contribute to improving the overall technical capabilities of the customers mission by participating in design (software and otherwise) sessions, developing unique capabilities and sharing insights and practices across Government organizations supporting similar missions  Required Skills and Education  Minimum Education: Bachelors of Science (B.S.) Degree in Computer Science, Computer Engineering, or Masters of Science (M.S.) in Information Systems.Relevant Experience: BAE Systems may consider candidates without the requisite bachelor's degree if they possess a minimum of five (5) years of relevant experience in relevant areas, or related fields, have demonstrated development proficiency, and/or advanced knowledge of computer programming and development systems and security practices in addition to the minimum experience requirements below.Minimum Experience: The Software Engineer will have five (5) or more years of technical experience as a Windows developer. The Software Engineer will have experience in deriving design specifications for functional activities and have the ability to develop, troubleshoot, and test complex software to satisfy design objectives. The Software Engineers will have experience in multi-tier software design and application; the use of object oriented programming languages, such as C, C#, and Java; and database design and implementation, preferably with SQL server. In addition the Software Engineer will have: Working knowledge and experience in participating in Agile software practices and team design session; and Demonstrated problem solving abilities with the ability to explore and evaluate many possible solutions to problems.Preferred Skills and Education  It is preferred that the Software Engineer have experience with REST service or Web server experience and experience in service/system interconnectivity in an enterprise environment. Previous experience supporting digital forensic and law enforcement programs is helpful.The desired candidate should have a passion for technology. This individual should be driven to provide innovation while also being able to excel in a team environment.About BAE Systems Intelligence & Security BAE Systems Intelligence & Security, based in McLean, Virginia, designs and delivers advanced defense, intelligence, and security solutions that support the important missions of our customers. Our pride and dedication shows in everything we do—from intelligence analysis, cyber operations and IT expertise to systems development, systems integration, and operations and maintenance services. Knowing that our work enables the U.S. military and government to recognize, manage and defeat threats inspires us to push ourselves and our technologies to new levels. That’s BAE Systems. That’s Inspired Work. Equal Opportunity Employer/Females/Minorities/Veterans/Disabled/Sexual Orientation/Gender Identity/Gender Expression. To see Inspired Work in action, visit www.baesystems.com and follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/baesystemsintel.", ' actively participate on teams of software developers, researchers, designers and tech leads; ', 'Preferred Skills and Education ', ' conducting rapid software prototyping to demonstrate and evaluate technologies in relevant environments; ', ' document software with an emphasis on architectures, user stories, and interface definitions; ', 'Software Engineer ', ' practice Agile software development methods; ', ' contribute to improving the overall technical capabilities of the customers mission by participating in design (software and otherwise) sessions, developing unique capabilities and sharing insights and practices across Government organizations supporting similar missions ', ' software assurance and security; ', ' interface with the technical community and other Government entities to understand challenges, needs, and develop solutions; and ', ' data architectures; ', ' conducting performance, security, and other aspects of evaluating software systems; ']

['', 'Identify and pursue opportunities -wherever they may be - for Surgo to have impact through software and tools. ', 'Travel', 'Work with the research and program teams to define roadmaps.', 'Python expert, including code optimization (for ML applications) and package development. Some subroutines are implemented in C++ so familiarity is desirable. Some knowledge of R is a bonus as much of our research code is in R.', 'Requirements', 'Lead back-end maintenance and development on our causal inference python package (a suite of modular packages using Bayesian networks. ', 'Lead back-end maintenance and development on our causal inference python package (a suite of modular packages using Bayesian networks. Improve the usability and usefulness of the causal inference tool through improved interfaces and outputs with best practices in software development.Set up infrastructure and processes for software development, QA, staging and production.Drive the adoption of our tool by establishing a technical online presence (e.g. support on Stack Overflow, proper documentation, issue tracking, peer-reviewed papers, conference presentations).Support our research projects by putting ETL pipelines into production, such as by working with the researchers to go from local scripts and csvs to cloud-based ETLs (proper pipelines and databases).Amplifying the impact of our research by producing user-friendly interfaces to interact with our findings and data (whether custom-built or through existing vendors).Identify and pursue opportunities -wherever they may be - for Surgo to have impact through software and tools. Maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks.Manage external contractors for specific pieces of engineering work.Work with the research and program teams to define roadmaps.', 'We love it if you have done different things with your time. ', 'Surgo is an ‘action tank’ focused on bringing precision to solutions that save and improve lives by integrating behavioral science, data science, and artificial intelligence. We partner with organizations and governments to help unlock some of their biggest challenges. We work wherever inequities exist, whether in low-income countries or in the United States, on major global issues such as reproductive health, maternal health, HIV/AIDs, tuberculosis, education, and housing.', 'If you think you are ideal for this position, write to us even if you don’t have all of the above preferred requirements.', 'Amplifying the impact of our research by producing user-friendly interfaces to interact with our findings and data (whether custom-built or through existing vendors).', 'Compensation', 'Location', 'Improve the usability and usefulness of the causal inference tool through improved interfaces and outputs with best practices in software development.', 'Experienced in translating theoretical algorithms to optimized production codes a plus. ', 'Role Description:', 'Maintain professional and technical knowledge by attending educational workshops; reviewing professional publications; establishing personal networks.', 'Our hiring philosophy', 'Travel: International and domestic travel (20%)', 'PhD-level candidate in AI/ML/computer science with at least 4+ years of experience developing and applying research software.', 'As the first full-time software engineer on the team, you will have the opportunity to leverage your problem-solving, independent learning, and creative initiative to achieve success. There will not be senior engineers to direct you on the finer points of test-driven development. This does not mean you are isolated: there is ample technical expertise in the team in terms of statistics, ML, and analytical code (both R and Python), and we pride ourselves on producing replicable research that bridges theory and practice to solve real-world problems for social good. We work with external teams that have deep expertise in theoretical ML and engineering. We are now looking to bring some of this knowledge in-house. With this in mind, our ideal candidate:', 'Short-listed applicants will go through several steps: a phone screening, a take-home project, and a virtual “on-site” with the team.', 'Interested applicants, please send your 1) resume/CV and 2) brief cover letter to Vincent Huang, Director of Data Science and AI, Surgo Foundation: Jobs@surgofoundation.org. Please add “Application for ML Software Engineer” in the subject of the email. Short-listed applicants will go through several steps: a phone screening, a take-home project, and a virtual “on-site” with the team.', 'Proven track record of taking on novel projects independently: we need broad expertise rather than a singular focus on one domain.', 'PhD-level candidate in AI/ML/computer science with at least 4+ years of experience developing and applying research software.Experienced in translating theoretical algorithms to optimized production codes a plus. Python expert, including code optimization (for ML applications) and package development. Some subroutines are implemented in C++ so familiarity is desirable. Some knowledge of R is a bonus as much of our research code is in R.Knowledge of machine learning methods and optimization (in particular Bayesian networks; we do some deep learning but this is not our main focus in the short term). Comfortable deploying AWS/Azure/GCloud compute pipelines and databases.Proven track record of taking on novel projects independently: we need broad expertise rather than a singular focus on one domain.Excellent communication (written, verbal and visual presentation) skills', 'Comfortable deploying AWS/Azure/GCloud compute pipelines and databases.', 'We hire for passion and core competencies. ', 'Application:', 'We look for problem solvers and lateral thinkers. ', 'Support our research projects by putting ETL pipelines into production, such as by working with the researchers to go from local scripts and csvs to cloud-based ETLs (proper pipelines and databases).', 'Our multidisciplinary team includes global development experts, data scientists, behavioral scientists, and technologists who are skilled in collecting, analyzing and interpreting data on why people behave the way they do and how complex systems work, and in developing scalable solutions and tools. We are a small but diverse team with big plans.\xa0\xa0', 'Knowledge of machine learning methods and optimization (in particular Bayesian networks; we do some deep learning but this is not our main focus in the short term). ', 'Excellent communication (written, verbal and visual presentation) skills', 'We are looking for an independent, versatile ML software engineer with experience building practical tools and solutions for the analysis of large-scale data sets. You would work closely with a team of research scientists as the sole engineer, so the diversity of the work is more akin to a startup than an established software company. As ML software engineer, your responsibilities will include:', 'Compensation: Highly competitive compensation and benefits package', 'Set up infrastructure and processes for software development, QA, staging and production.', 'Location: Washington DC, USA (We are currently remote due to COVID-19. Our team generally operates from our DC office. We are open to the possibility that this role could continue to operate remotely post-pandemic).', 'Manage external contractors for specific pieces of engineering work.', 'Drive the adoption of our tool by establishing a technical online presence (e.g. support on Stack Overflow, proper documentation, issue tracking, peer-reviewed papers, conference presentations).', 'Application', 'Our hiring philosophy:', 'Requirements:', 'Interested applicants, please send your 1) resume/CV and 2) brief cover letter to Vincent Huang, Director of Data Science and AI, Surgo Foundation: Jobs@surgofoundation.org. Please add “Application for ML Software Engineer” in the subject of the email. ', 'Role Description']

['', 'Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves.Your role is incredibly data driven, whether that be understanding natural language, analysing trends or determining which of our products is best suited to a user - we have interesting problems to solve on an ever-increasing scale.\xa0You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.", 'Marketing Data Scientist/Analyst - Software - AI Marketing Software Start-Up', '.', 'In order to apply for this role you will have the following experience:', 'Professional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and munging', 'Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQuery', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniques', 'Experience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'A self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value Creation', "Orama are proud to announce their exclusive partnership with an AI Marketing Software Start-up who are tipped to be one of the biggest success stories of 2021. Their unique value proposition allows enterprise companies to understand and predict their customers' buying habits/patterns combining data gained from omnichannel marketing tech with the latest machine learning advances. Following their recent addtion of $40m+ round of funding, they are looking to hire a Data Science specialist who can help create value within their largest customers by deriving insights from data. This is a unique opportunity to play a pivotal role in their growth - GET IN TOUCH NOW!", 'Desired Skills and Experience', 'You will proactively research, explore and examine data from a variety of angles to determine hidden weaknesses, trends and/or opportunities.', 'Is able to translate numerical data into visual representations that convey a business-focus to our customers.', 'Basic $100K-150K + bonus + Stock + Benefits', 'Professional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)', 'You will build new tools to automate work or provide real-time reporting systems.', 'Expert in Math (linear algebra, calculus, and probability), Statistics (hypothesis testing and summary statistics), Data visualization (BI, Looker, Google Sheets/Cloud) and reporting techniquesProfessional with skills in Data mining, Data cleaning and mungingProfessional skills in programming (SQL databases, R, Python)Exposure to cloud-based data platforms, ideally BigQueryExperience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modelingA self-starter that is not afraid to dig in and show initiative, to find creative solutions to problems and bring to the Director of Value CreationExperience with marketing data, metrics and KPIs\xa0would be an ideal but not essential', 'Sophisticated with analytics programs, machine learning, and statistical methods and quick with preparing data for use in predictive and prescriptive modeling', 'Experience with ML tools and techniques (k-nearest neighbors, random forests, ensemble methods)', "Working with the Director of Value Creation, you will be responsible for deriving insights from specific customer data; helping them to be as successful as possible at predicting their customer's purchasing behaviour whilst also driving our ability to build effective business cases to increase our revenue stream with our customers themselves."]

['', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Tuition reimbursement', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0WORK/LIFE Balance', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Deep experience with database optimizer paths and data warehouse performance features.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0You will enjoy working with some of the smartest engineers in Boise', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Fun, collaborative work environment', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0BEER30s/Snacks -once COVID passes', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Minimum of three years of experience implementing dimensional data models (star schemas).', 'The Data Warehouse Engineer gathers and interprets user analytics requirements, then transforms those requirements into dimensional data models. They collaborate with data analysts, data scientists, and other data consumers within the business to gather and populate data warehouse table structures. The Data Warehouse Engineer implements dimensional models, from building the logical model to implementing the physical model and loading the data with ETL. The engineer makes big data easy through intuitive query writing, performance, and integrating BI tools. They run the full DW stack from design through implementation.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Matching 401k contributions', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0yearly bonuses', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Regular team meetings and one-on-ones with your manager to make sure you are heard, and you are on track Career development and lots of internal promotion – this group is growing!', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Extract use cases and requirements from data warehouse users.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design dimensional data models that satisfy data requirements and address ease of use and performance.', 'Here’s what you get:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Instantiate the dimensional data models on the Snowflake cloud platform.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Work with users to mock-up dashboards and proof of concept data models.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Charitable contributions and activities that make you feel like a better person', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Working on the latest and coolest technologies', 'We are working on an exclusive retained search for a Data Warehouse Engineer for our client an industry leader experiencing hyper-growth headquartered in Boise, ID.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or equivalent experience.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience dimensional data modeling for data warehousing using star schemas or Snowflake schemas.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Experience with building data warehouses on cloud infrastructure preferred.', "Here's what you’ll be doing:", 'Here’s what you bring to the table:', 'Data Warehouse Engineer ', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Design and build out monitoring and support elements to ensure data quality and timeliness.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0GREAT benefits']
