You will be expected to work collaboratively in multidisciplinary teams to develop innovative solutions for learning and training challenges.', "Unless otherwise agreed to in writing or authorized under policies of the Company, the employee must report each working day to one of Aptima's places of business to conduct their employment activities.[SA1]\xa0", "What You'll Do", 'preferred', 'EOE MINORITIES/FEMALES/PROTECTED VETERANS/DISABLED', "Unless otherwise agreed to in writing or authorized under policies of the Company, the employee must report each working day to one of Aptima's places of business to conduct their employment activities.[SA1]\xa0All commutes to an employee's assigned Aptima place of business will be made without expectation of travel per diem.Business travel may be required to locations including but not limited to conferences, other office locations, and/or military sites.", 'Excellent organizational skills', 'Experience developing/delivering military training\xa0preferred', 'Knowledge about psychometrics, statistics, training and education (particularly in complex domains), psychological research methods, and some scientific software (e.g. SPSS, SAS, R)Working in multidisciplinary teamsExcellent written and verbal communication skillsExcellent organizational skillsProposal writing experience\xa0preferredExperience developing/delivering military training\xa0preferred', "For 25 years, Aptima's mission has been to improve and optimize performance in mission-critical, technology-intensive settings. ['', "-\tBachelor's degree and 5 years or more related experience; Masters and 3 years or more related experience.", '-\tSupport the FOT throughout mission.', '-\tHave a basic knowledge of cloud infrastructure. ', '-\tMS Office skills required.', '-\tBe able to do shift work during mission.', ' ', 'The OSAM-1 mission is a Goddard Space Flight Center Exploration and In-Space Services (NExIS) Projects Division managed mission. OSAM-1 is a robotic servicing mission designed to refuel a Low Earth Orbit (LEO) satellite. It contains 3 elements: the Flight Element comprised of the OSAM-1 Servicing Vehicle (RSV) and development testbeds, the Ground Element comprised of the systems required to conduct satellite operations and their supporting networks and facilities, and the Launch Element comprised of the Launch Vehicle and supporting facilities and services. NExIS is responsible for the design, engineering, development, test and operations of the OSAM-1 Mission through an integrated team at GSFC. The Servicing Payload design, development and RSV integration will be conducted at GSFC.', '-\tProvide support during database installation and testing of post deployment checkout.', '-\tMust be able to pass a Government background investigation and clearance, requiring US citizenship.', 'Primary responsibilities include the following:', '-\tCoordinate with NASA Integration and Test (I&T) engineers to understand developments during spacecraft assembly.', '-\tSupport other duties as assigned.', '-\tInterface with other spacecraft Subsystem SMEs as well as Spacecraft and Instrument SMEs for database feedback.', 'Qwaltec is a Women-Owned Small Business (WOSB) that specializes in space systems operations. We provide expertise in operations and engineering, mission readiness, technical training, and systems engineering for satellite mission control centers. Our vision is to make a difference on and off the planet, by focusing as much on our customers and team members as we do on the mission. We strive for excellence and accountability, and we do everything we can to exceed expectations while acting with integrity and compassion. We invest in relationships, and we value openness, honesty, and fairness in all our endeavors. ', 'Qwaltec is seeking a Satellite Database Engineer on the NASA GSMO II contract in support of the On-Orbit Servicing, Assembly and Manufacturing mission 1 (OSAM-1) program at NASA Goddard Space Flight Center (GSFC). The position is located in Greenbelt, MD.', '-\tSpacecraft subsystems experience in operations or I&T.', '-\tSupport the development of database-related software tools.', 'An Equal Opportunity/Affirmative Action Employer, Qwaltec is committed to hiring a diverse and talented workforce. For more information, visit qwaltec.com.', '-\tRelational database experience with an understanding of SQL.', '-\tSupport the FOT in meetings with vendors with regards to database contents. This includes coordinating with spacecraft, instrument, and ground system vendors.', '-\tBecome the Subject Matter Expert (SME) on the verification and validation of satellite databases to support the Flight Operation Team (FOT).', '-\tPrevious experience/proficiency with tools/languages such as XML, Perl, etc.', 'About Qwaltec', 'PM20']

["A global leader in Healthcare Software is looking for a Mid or Senior Level Full Stack .Net Software Engineer with experience in building Single Page Applications. The company has been in business for over 28 years and builds Software solutions for Clinical Trials used by Pharmaceutical companies across the globe.  Our software engineers are hands-on developers that excels in a dynamic, fast-moving, and agile environments and are passionate about developing high quality, high performance, and scalable software. This role will work aside a team of seasoned engineers whose main objective is to maintain all aspects of the overall software development lifecycle and ensure the on-time, quality delivery of software product releases.  In this role you'll be responsible for maintaining the existing version of our software, building custom features, functions and reports for our clients. You will also have opportunities for building the next generation version of our product which will incorporate Mobile, Machine Learning and Artificial Intelligence component. You'll work with a small team using C#, .NET, MS SQL Server, Multi-threading, WCF/WebAPI, and other MS development tools. You'll also be working on new products that tie the software into IoT, mobile devices, and other design solutions.  Responsibilities  * Execute development pipeline and delivery of the organization's software products to QA, and ultimately to production * Work with product owner and key partners in Project Management, Business, QA and Technology * Work with project lead and product owner to provide development sizing & cost analysis estimates * Work closely with product owner and team members to decompose stories, design features, and prioritize tasks * Support integration efforts to build whole systems from various subsystems * Identify technology risks early and establish mitigation plans * Prototype, validate and create specific application solutions for the business  Requirements  * Min. 4+ years of C#, .NET, Visual Studio * Strong experience developing/managing REST and SOAP-based Web Service API(s) * Understanding of Object Oriented design and programming; OO, OOD, OOP * Experience with HTML5, Javascript and CSS3 * Experience with browser-based web applications delivered over the Internet that support user concurrency * Experience with distributed multi-tier applications and with SQL development experience * Multi-Threading; either professional on conceptual knowledge * Bachelor's degree in Computer Engineering or related field * Must be self-motivated as well as creative and efficient in proposing solutions to complex, time-critical problem * Good understanding of the latest Architecture and Development Standards and Guidelines * Must be willing to remediate code written by others * Team player attitude with a focus on the success of the team is a MUST  Nice to haves  * Any Android, iOS, or other mobile development * Machine Learning (ML), Artificial Intelligence (AI) * Experience with front-end libraries, AngularJS, Knockout, and jQuery. Bootstrap is a plus. * Experience with Software as a Service (SaaS), multi-tenancy application development ", 'Job description ', '\xa0 ', ' Requirements', 'Nice to haves', 'Job description', 'Responsibilities', '\xa0']

['', 'We’re virtual', 'Superior ability to analyze and interpret the results of product experiments.', 'Have previous experience as technical lead on consumer products in the area of conversational assistants, chatbots, search, recommendation, personalization or related areas.', 'About Global Tech', 'Are a Self-starter, Quick learner, Keen observer, eye for detail and someone who relishes challenges', 'We’re virtual\xa0', 'Deep knowledge of machine learning, information retrieval, data mining, statistics, NLP or related field.', 'Being human-led is our true disruption.', 'Experience working with large data sets and distributed computing tools a plus (Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark etc.)', 'Proven experience working with statistical languages such as R.', 'Strong communication skills both written and verbal', 'Ph.D. in computer science or similar field or MS with 3+ years of related experience', 'Have knowledge of Spark, Scikit-learn, problem solving, and are willing to learn new technologies.', 'Have a strong research and publication record', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code,\xa0but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations.\xa0Being human-led is our true disruption.\xa0', "We're looking for:", 'Good functional coding skills in C++, Java, Scala in addition to good knowledge of one of the scripting languages such as Python or Perl.', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'At the Walmart Voice Voice & Ubiquity team we are building completely new capabilities to allow our customers to shop seamlessly across devices like smart speakers, mobile phones, appliances etc using multi-modal conversational interfaces. This team is part of the Emerging Technology organization. Voice as a medium for shopping is still in its infancy and as part of this team you will get to work on industry leading solutions and be at the forefront of this emerging platform. You will get to be part of defining how customers shop in everyday lives. You can learn more about some of the work we do here:  https://medium.com/walmartglobaltech/building-a-conversational-assistant-platform-for-voice-enabled-shopping-6d174cdc4131', 'Have knowledge of Spark, Scikit-learn, problem solving, and are willing to learn new technologies.Are a Self-starter, Quick learner, Keen observer, eye for detail and someone who relishes challengesHave a strong research and publication recordHave previous experience as technical lead on consumer products in the area of conversational assistants, chatbots, search, recommendation, personalization or related areas.', 'Ph.D. in computer science or similar field or MS with 3+ years of related experienceDeep knowledge of machine learning, information retrieval, data mining, statistics, NLP or related field.Good functional coding skills in C++, Java, Scala in addition to good knowledge of one of the scripting languages such as Python or Perl.Experience working with large data sets and distributed computing tools a plus (Map/Reduce, Hadoop, Hive, Spark etc.)Superior ability to analyze and interpret the results of product experiments.Proven experience working with statistical languages such as R.Strong communication skills both written and verbal', 'You will blow us away if you:', '\xa0']

At Acquia we believe in the power of community and collaboration - giving our customers the freedom to build tomorrow on their terms.", 'Able to lead by example\xa0', 'As a Senior Software Engineer, you will be an individual contributor for implementation and developing the adoption of Kubernetes as a service across Acquia. We are building for the future of the web, and we want you to be a part of it.', 'Able to lead by example\xa0A passionate learner who provides guidance through questions as opposed to statementsInclined to document and diagram ideas as a primary method of communicationAble to communicate complex, technical concepts to a wide range of stakeholders with varying perspectives and ['', 'Take the initiative to discover, diagnose and resolve performance bottlenecks at scale before our users notice.', 'Leverage billions of data points to drive your decisions, optimizing your features for fellow engineers, Roblox developers and Roblox players.', 'You Are:', 'Being the coolest adult kids know :)', 'Working with a world class team that will challenge, empower and stand by you', 'You Should Love:', 'In 2020, we were honored to be recognized as a Certified\xa0Great Place to Work®. Join the Roblox team where play rules and the possibilities are endless.', 'A leader by example: raising the technical bar for your team by identifying processes to improve, technologies to leverage and ways to mentor.', 'The impact that you can have at Roblox is powerful. We’re looking for someone who’s eager to take on a meaningful role in the success of Roblox on a massive scale. Someone who takes play seriously, but also isn’t afraid to have some fun either. They are intimately familiar with all of our technologies and exceptional problem solvers. We’re the one and only fastest-growing entertainment platform that lets anyone teach themselves how to code, publish, and monetize any experience imaginable—across any device—reaching millions of players across the globe.', '\xa0']

['', 'Collaborate with product, sales, and engineering teams at MOLOCO to design and implement future products.', 'What You Will Do', 'Design and implement efficient and scalable data processing pipelines across different internal systems of the RTB engine.', 'Design and implement efficient and scalable data processing pipelines across different internal systems of the RTB engine.Analyze a large amount of time-series data, and use it to help optimize internal data processing pipelines as well as other parts of the RTB engine.Innovate the ways other teams at MOLOCO interact with big data in order to improve productivity across the teams.Collaborate with product, sales, and engineering teams at MOLOCO to design and implement future products.', '4+ years of software development experiences in Cloud Computing, Distributed Computing, and/or Big Data Management.Fluent with one or more programming languages including Python, Java, and Golang.Experience with MapReduce frameworks, distributed systems, cloud computing technologies, and computer architecture.Excellent written and oral communication skills.Strong analytical troubleshooting skills.Knowledgeable with challenges in designing, implementing, and maintaining production-level data processing pipelines.', 'Excellent written and oral communication skills.', 'We use various Google Cloud Products, including Bigtable, BigQuery, and Dataflow to manage big data.', 'Innovate the ways other teams at MOLOCO interact with big data in order to improve productivity across the teams.', '\xa0We are seeking exceptional data engineers to join us in building a state-of-the-art mobile advertising platform. We understand the value of a strong engineering team and strive to hire only the best software engineers. While tackling challenging real-world problems, you will make a positive impact on millions of mobile users in the world and grow with top-notch colleagues. Check out\xa0our case study\xa0published by Google.', '\xa0Qualifications', 'The MOLOCO RTB is a top-rated real-time bidding platform that provides scale across more than 7.5 billion devices, while the SaaS-based MOLOCO Cloud enables marketers to take control of their programmatic advertising in-house. MOLOCO is headquartered in Silicon Valley, with offices in San Francisco, Seattle, New York, London, Seoul, Singapore and Tokyo.\xa0', '4+ years of software development experiences in Cloud Computing, Distributed Computing, and/or Big Data Management.', "We use various Google Cloud Products, including Bigtable, BigQuery, and Dataflow to manage big data.MOLOCO was featured as a customer example in the Data and Analytics Platform Overview at GCP Next'18. You can check out\xa0this video\xa0for more details about the company and the product (note that the presentation took place in July 2018, and we've grown & improved so much over the past two years!).", 'Experience with MapReduce frameworks, distributed systems, cloud computing technologies, and computer architecture.', 'MOLOCO is a programmatic advertising company that empowers mobile businesses to unleash the power of their data for fast, sustainable growth. Founded in 2013 by top talent from Google, Amazon, and Oracle, the company offers a complete suite of proprietary advertising solutions to help mobile companies optimize the performance of their acquisition, retention, and monetization efforts.', 'Strong analytical troubleshooting skills.', "MOLOCO was featured as a customer example in the Data and Analytics Platform Overview at GCP Next'18. You can check out\xa0this video\xa0for more details about the company and the product (note that the presentation took place in July 2018, and we've grown & improved so much over the past two years!).", 'Fluent with one or more programming languages including Python, Java, and Golang.', 'Analyze a large amount of time-series data, and use it to help optimize internal data processing pipelines as well as other parts of the RTB engine.', 'Knowledgeable with challenges in designing, implementing, and maintaining production-level data processing pipelines.', 'About Data Team at MOLOCO']

['', 'Drive projects of high visibility across the organization.\xa0', "7+ years’ experience in internet-scale distributed technologies (e.g. Solr, Kafka, Mem Cache, and similar technologies ) and/or Big Data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Storm and similar technologies)Relevant experience with relational / non-relational databases (e.g. MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, etc)Strong background in algorithms and data structuresExpertise in one or more programming languages (e.g. Java, Scala, etc).Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience", ' ', 'Being\xa0human-led\xa0is our true disruption.', 'Develop highly scalable services to process millions of requests per day and solve complex software systems problems by leveraging state-of-the-art technology.', 'Advanced knowledge of performance, scalability, and system architecture with an eye toward avoiding and reducing technical debt.', 'Walmart’s Advertising Technology group enables the connection between supplier brands and retail shoppers at an unprecedented scale. As primary stewards of our brand promise, “Save Money. Live Better,” we work alongside some of the most talented people in the world to engage with the more than 150M households who shop with us. This position is part of the Sponsored Products team in the Advertising Technology organization. Walmart is investing in building a world-class advertising platform and the Sponsored Products team is responsible for building performance advertising products that drive discovery, sales, and profit. The team operates an end to end advertising platform that includes the ad server that serves hundreds of millions of impressions each day, sophisticated ad matching algorithms, real-time measurement, self-service buying interface for end to end campaign management. ', 'Previous experience in the advertising domainAdvanced knowledge of performance, scalability, and system architecture with an eye toward avoiding and reducing technical debt.Strong inclination towards exploring and learning new technologies.Understanding of machine learningHands-on experience developing in a service-oriented architecture for a Linux environment', 'We are a highly motivated group of engineers and data scientists, working in an agile group to solve sophisticated and high impact problems. We serve billions of ad requests every month with our high-performance ad servers. We build smart data systems that ingest, model and analyze massive flow of data from online and offline user activity. We use cutting edge machine learning, data mining and optimization algorithms to analyze data. Above all, we are passionate about delivering experiences that our customers and advertisers love. ', 'What you will do: ', 'We’re virtual\xa0', 'Work with the data scientists and product managers to carry out various experiments across different areas of the AdTech platforms to improve customer experience and ad relevance.', 'Develop highly scalable services to process millions of requests per day and solve complex software systems problems by leveraging state-of-the-art technology.Gain exposure to various technologies used in Advertising and E-commerce platforms.Work with the data scientists and product managers to carry out various experiments across different areas of the AdTech platforms to improve customer experience and ad relevance.Drive projects of high visibility across the organization.\xa0', "Bachelor/Master's degree in Computer Science or equivalent experience", 'Gain exposure to various technologies used in Advertising and E-commerce platforms.', 'Imagine working in an environment where one line of code can make life easier for hundreds of millions of people and put a smile on their face. That’s what we do at Walmart Global Tech. We’re a team of 15,000+ software engineers, data scientists and service professionals within Walmart, the world’s largest retailer, delivering innovations that improve how our customers shop and empower our 2.2 million associates. To others, innovation looks like an app, service or some code,\xa0but Walmart has always been about people. People are why we innovate, and people power our innovations.\xa0Being\xa0human-led\xa0is our true disruption.\xa0', '7+ years’ experience in internet-scale distributed technologies (e.g. Solr, Kafka, Mem Cache, and similar technologies ) and/or Big Data frameworks (e.g. Hadoop, Spark, Hive, Storm and similar technologies)', 'Previous experience in the advertising domain', 'Strong inclination towards exploring and learning new technologies.', 'What you will have : ', 'Expertise in one or more programming languages (e.g. Java, Scala, etc).', 'Strong background in algorithms and data structures', 'Working virtually this year has helped us make quicker decisions, remove location barriers across our global team, be more flexible in our personal lives and spend less time commuting.\xa0Today, we are reimagining the tech workplace of the future by making a permanent transition to virtual work for most of our team. Of course, being together in person is an important part of our culture and shared success. We’ll collaborate in person at a regular cadence and with purpose.\xa0\xa0\xa0', 'Relevant experience with relational / non-relational databases (e.g. MySQL, Oracle, Cassandra, etc)', 'About Global Tech\xa0', 'Plus if you have: ', 'Hands-on experience developing in a service-oriented architecture for a Linux environment', 'Understanding of machine learning', '\xa0']

['', 'Obviously you’re computer proficient (Software, Hardware, Anyware) with experience in computer programming using NET 1.1 / 2.0 / 3.5, ASP.NET, AJAX, VB / C#, JavaScript, VB Script, HTML and XML - XSLT.\xa0Your knowledge of Web and Windows Applications architecture and Microsoft programming is basically innate.', 'That something extra we´d love to see…', 'Develop an awareness of programming and design alternatives', 'The Abarcan Data Fields are full of complex circuitry, storage houses, and data processing facilities. ['', 'C++', 'C++ program language,', 'Angular knowledge', ' ', 'embedded software experience,', 'Embedded Software Engineer Software Engineer with C++, and embedded software experience is needed participate in reviewing existing solutions and providing recommendations for extensions, customizations and new solutions for a product suite for a dynamic company.  This is a long term contract position with potential to convert to full-time.  The position is 100% remote, but must be in either the Central or Eastern Time Zones.  Due to contractual obligations, candidates must be on our W2..  Responsibilities for the Embedded Software Engineer • Work closely with other team members to understand product requirements and translate them into software solutions • Work within set deadlines and deliver high quality, well unit tested code using prescribed specifications • Reviews, analyzes, and modifies existing systems including encoding, testing, debugging and installing • Investigate and analyze information and draw conclusions • Analyzes performance of programs and takes action to correct deficiencies based on consultation with project technical lead and project managers • Implement and troubleshoot programming changes and modifications • Maintains and modifies routine programs; makes approved changes by amending flow charts, developing detailed programming logic, and coding changes • Required to unit test own code, providing low/minimal error rate • Maintains a broad knowledge of state-of-the-art technology, equipment, and/or systems • Work in an Agile software development environment, including emergent architecture, changing requirements, and changing priorities (SCRUM, Agile, etc.) • Participate in team discussions and develop solutions using best practices in code review atmosphere • Provides timely technical status reporting to project technical leads • Expected to prepare system documentation, test plans and deployment plans, where/when applicable  Requirements for the Embedded Software Engineer  • Bachelor or Master’s Degree in Computer Science, Computer/Software Engineering, or equivalent post-secondary education • Minimum 3 years of internal and/or related development experience • Strong understanding of coding languages and tools including but not limited to HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Angular v2+, TypeScript, .NET C#, C++ • C++ program language, XML, Angular knowledge, experience in embedded software experience, device experience is most desired. • Solid software engineering foundation with deep skills in Object Oriented Development • Strong verbal and written communication skills • A passion for detail and developing quality software • Hardworking, self-motivated, and passionate about learning and working with the latest technologies • Inspired by having to think outside the box and work with your fellow team members to find solutions to problems • A team player who adapts quickly to ever-changing environments ', 'Embedded Software Engineer ', '100% remote', '\xa0 ', 'device experience is most desired.', ' Responsibilities for the Embedded Software Engineer', 's•com is an Equal Opportunity Employer - All qualified applicants will receive consideration without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, age, disability, veteran status, or any other factor determined to be unlawful under applicable law. ', 'Please apply online or email ian.mulloy@scom-usa.com.  If you don’t meet these requirements, but are interested in other Impellam NA, Corestaff Services or s.com opportunities, please register with us online at ess.impellam.com. ['', 'Demonstration of excellent communication and teamwork skills', 'BS in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science or equivalent field of study', 'Job Description', ' Write test scripts for implementation of calibration and measurement algorithms for complex microcircuits and modules in New Product Introduction (NPI) phase. Partner with Test EE to lead and implement test development planning and execution. Apply state of the art SW development tools to do implementation efficiently. Provide test characterization support, manages test specifications and test data during the NPI phase. Analyze and resolve the software interfaces between the various test subsystems. Our engineers develop software for our market-leading Signal Analyzers, Signal Sources, and Electronic Measurement Applications. The development involves the full software lifecycle of requirements capture, investigation, product definition, design, implement, test, production and maintenance. They work with manufacturing and software teams in other geographies world-wide. The position involves developing in C# on Windows 10, controlling advanced measurement hardware. ', ' BS in Electrical Engineering or Computer Science or equivalent field of study Demonstration of excellent communication and teamwork skills Strong problem-solving and quantitative data analysis skills Proficiency in Microsoft office software (MS Word, Excel, Teams, One Note) Ability to quickly learn new technologies Experience with Microsoft Visual Studio Experience with C# or other OOP language. Desire and interest in electronic hardware control (network analyzer, spectrum analyzers, signal generators etc.)', 'More Specifically The Applicant Will Be Responsible For', 'Tellus Solutions', 'Ability to quickly learn new technologies', 'Requirements: ', 'Desire and interest in electronic hardware control (network analyzer, spectrum analyzers, signal generators etc.)', 'Strong problem-solving and quantitative data analysis skills', 'The development involves the full software lifecycle of requirements capture, investigation, product definition, design, implement, test, production and maintenance. They work with manufacturing and software teams in other geographies world-wide. The position involves developing in C# on Windows 10, controlling advanced measurement hardware.', 'Qualifications', 'R&D Software Engineer', 'Proficiency in Microsoft office software (MS Word, Excel, Teams, One Note)', 'Provide test characterization support, manages test specifications and test data during the NPI phase.', 'Our engineers develop software for our market-leading Signal Analyzers, Signal Sources, and Electronic Measurement Applications.', 'Experience with Microsoft Visual Studio', 'Partner with Test EE to lead and implement test development planning and execution.', 'Experience with C# or other OOP language.', 'Analyze and resolve the software interfaces between the various test subsystems.', 'Write test scripts for implementation of calibration and measurement algorithms for complex microcircuits and modules in New Product Introduction (NPI) phase.', 'Apply state of the art SW development tools to do implementation efficiently.']

['', 'The Largest Digital Health IPO in History: ', ' Competitive compensation packages ', ' Lunch provided Monday through Thursday (in office) ', ' Work with the Product team to design and deliver features, and with the Data Science team to build analysis on device data. ', ' 5+ years experience in software engineering in a functional or object-oriented language (such as Scala, Java, Python) ', ' Passion, collaboration, and productivity in a dynamic cross-functional team environment ', 'Why Join Livongo?', ' Solid grasp of engineering principles, test-driven development, and CI/CD process ', 'Candidate Profile', '  Competitive compensation packages   Comprehensive medical, dental, vision and 401K   Generous PTO policy   10 paid holidays each year   Lunch provided Monday through Thursday (in office)   An endless variety of healthy snacks and beverages to fuel your creativity   Employee Stock Purchase Plan   Employee Referral Bonus Program   Team events and social gatherings   Pet-friendly environment in Mountain View, CA and Denver   Diabetes Care Prescription Reimbursement   Discount/Subsidy program for gym membership   Provide the full line of Livongo programs and services to all employees and their families  ', ' Take ownership of our microservices infrastructure that: ', 'Best Places to Work', '  Processes and stores millions of biometric readings each day, including blood pressure, weight, blood glucose, and CGM data   Provides clinical features such as coaching, alerting, advice, and digital programs   Automatically ships devices and medical supplies to members when needed   Provisions connectivity, authentication, and member profiles to devices   Collect telemetry, such as battery level and connectivity, and monitor device health  ', '  As a member of the Devices Backend team, you will:   Build the backend platform that powers hundreds of thousands of Livongo smart devices.   Take ownership of our microservices infrastructure that: ', 'What makes a Software Engineer at Livongo different?', '  BS degree in Engineering, Computer Science or a related field. In lieu of degree, relevant work experience and/or trade school is acceptable   5+ years experience in software engineering in a functional or object-oriented language (such as Scala, Java, Python)   Experience implementing REST/gRPC APIs and event-driven architecture   Solid grasp of engineering principles, test-driven development, and CI/CD process   Passion, collaboration, and productivity in a dynamic cross-functional team environment   Strong written and verbal skills, including the ability to communicate succinctly, effectively explaining technical concepts to non-technical personnel   Adaptability in changing work environments, managing new priorities, new instructions, delays, or unexpected events  ', ' Collect telemetry, such as battery level and connectivity, and monitor device health ', ' Discount/Subsidy program for gym membership ', ' Processes and stores millions of biometric readings each day, including blood pressure, weight, blood glucose, and CGM data ', ' Diabetes Care Prescription Reimbursement ', ' Experience implementing REST/gRPC APIs and event-driven architecture ', ' An endless variety of healthy snacks and beverages to fuel your creativity ', 'Make an Impact', ' Provide the full line of Livongo programs and services to all employees and their families ', ' Generous PTO policy ', 'Our Benefits Include', ' Build the backend platform that powers hundreds of thousands of Livongo smart devices. ', ' Apply and lead the best practices to create elegant, adaptable, scalable software. ', ' Simply stated, Livongo exists to empower people with chronic conditions to live better and healthier lives. ['', 'The company will pay very competitive salary (up to $250k depending on experience) plus equity (about 1% give or take, depending on experience) which could be very lucrative since they are seeking to build a billion dollar company and are on pace to achieve that within the next few years.', '- Very data oriented.\xa0Highly motivated to use data to make a positive impact on customers and the world.', 'Qualifications:', 'Job Responsibilities:', '- Taking ownership of internal tooling and 3rd party API integrations.', '- Primarily programming in Python and Django.', '- Mastery of CS fundamentals', "- A Bachelor's degree in CS or equivalent experience.", '- Use empathy for customers to design technology that will make their lives better.', '- Designing and implementing mechanisms for customers to back-test their decisions', '- A passion for understanding “why” in order to solve problems quickly and effectively.', '- Willing to learn (if necessary) and primarily program with Python and Django.\xa0Strong in at least one of:\xa01)\xa0Java, 2)\xa0C++, 3)\xa0Scala, 4)\xa0Go, 5)\xa0C#, 6)\xa0Python, 7)\xa0Ruby on Rails, or 8)\xa0Node.JS.', "The company's product is in the realms of housing, real estate, and SaaS. Their product is both for consumers as well as b2b. It is primarily on mobile but also on web. The product is democratizing access to housing, and the company seeks people who would be passionate about the positive social impact they would have by building the product.", 'New York, NY', '- Working with a small team to build product at a rapid pace.', '- A passion for being a part of building a massive business', 'Sr. Backend Engineer - up to $250k - Social Good Startup', "The company has 6 employees, is seed funded, and is much more mature and financially strong than typical startups at this stage and size. It already has millions of dollars in its revenue pipeline. Right now the company's Head of Engineering has been doing the front end engineering all by himself, and the front end engineering is the main bottleneck to them onboarding their many waiting customers more quickly. So they want someone who can come in and own the front end engineering.", "- Designing and implement engines to help the company's customers be more transparent and data-driven.", '- At least 4 years of industry experience as a backend engineer.', '- Uncompromising moral integrity.']

['', 'We are the frontline evangelists and trusted advisors to our customers. Zaloni understands its customers require industry expertise as well as an ability to help them meet their business objectives. Zaloni customer service is the support we offer to our customers — both before and after they buy and use our products or services — that helps them have an easy and enjoyable experience. Offering amazing customer support is an important part of retaining customers and growing a business. It is more than just providing answers; it is an integral facet of the promise that Zaloni’s brand makes to its customers.', 'Assist in the maintenance of the Zaloni knowledge base and create new articles based on recent customer issues', 'Motivation to take proactive ownership in identifying and recommending product improvements in key product areas based on key data points', "Bachelor’s or Master's degree in Engineering or equivalent", 'Prior customer support experience in Big Data or Cloud', 'Work closely with the team to identify, estimate, and prioritize issues and tickets', 'For additional information, please visit www.zaloni.com.', 'Scripting at the command line level for Linux', 'Responsibilities', 'Assist with resolving general product and cloud issues and frequently asked questions; take ownership of tickets until full resolution', 'Our Amazing #TeamZaloni', 'Our Awesome Company', 'Effectively communicate support ticket information to team members and stakeholders in a timely and clear fashion', 'Demonstrate strong interpersonal and communication skills while working with customers and the internal team', 'Experience with BigData concepts - HDFS Concepts, Cloud, ETL, Streaming, or other Big Data/Analytics technology preferred', 'The Software Engineer works with customers to maintain satisfaction and drive resolution on all Support cases across Zaloni’s Arena platform. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training.', 'Knowledge of Python, shell script, and Linux', 'Knowledge of AWS or Azure', 'Required Skills/Qualifications', 'Zaloni simplifies big data for transformative business insights. ['The Staining Software Engineer Associate will own and manage each assigned project from start to finish in a fast paced environment. As part of the Software Development organization, the Staining Software Engineer Associate will design and develop staining procedures for efficient performance on the Roche Diagnostics Solutions staining instruments. Through the use of a scripting language, you will package the staining procedure into an installer. This installer will deliver the staining procedure and required database records to the instrument software. In addition, you will execute both manual and automated verification tests along with owning the design control documentation.', 'Skilled with use of word processing, spreadsheets, graphical and presentation software applications', 'Organizational skills and ability to manage multiple concurrent projects', 'Knowledge of software databases', 'Required Skills:', 'Strong analytical and written/verbal communication skills', 'Knowledge of creating software documentation for a medical device', 'Ability to meet deadlines and deliver projects on time', 'Ability to plan project components and effectively report status to stakeholders', 'Knowledge of scripting languages']

['', 'JOB', 'EXPERIENCE', 'The Sr. SDE will be part of an agile development team, building and working on enterprise-grade software systems on top of the Microsoft .NET development stack. The Sr. SDE develops information systems by designing, developing, and installing software solutions that are scalable for a high transaction environment.  JOB\xa0RESPONSIBILITIES ', " Job Expectations: ● Follow secure programming and web application security best practices ● Responsible for writing technical design specifications ● Recommend and develop an architectural and detailed design that is used by other members of the development teams ● Coach the team on software best practices (design, coding, troubleshooting, work breakdown, work estimation, refactor strategies, automated testing, etc.) ● Must be able to mentor all levels ● Work closely with the other teams to optimize system architecture and project efficiency ● Partner with our Product Owner to plan work and prioritization ● Maintain high standards of software quality within the team by establishing good practices and habits ● Provide regular updates on projects and team performance ● Identify and encourage areas for growth and improvement within the team ● Assist in the collection and documentation of user's requirements, development of user stories, estimates and work plans ● Collaborate and add value through participation in peer code reviews, providing comments and suggestions ● Analyze and resolve technical and application problems ● Regular practice of CI/CD ● Support, maintain and document software functionality ● Research and evaluate a variety of software products; create PoCs as necessary to demonstrate new ideas and technologies Judgment/Reasoning Ability\u200b: \u200bAble to identify, troubleshoot and resolve problems quickly using sound judgment, poise and diplomacy. Ability to use judgment and reasoning skills, and determine when to escalate issues, as required, in a timely manner.  Must be Techno-Functional and be able to comprehend a problem and ask the right questions to both business leaders/c level execs to committe members all the way to the lower level tech arm.  EXPERIENCE "]

['', 'o\tWorking knowledge of ITIL disciplines', 'Proxios offers a cloud computing approach to office technology by providing web based virtual desktop access to corporate applications, email and SaaS applications from our hybrid cloud. Rather than owning and operating in-house systems, Proxios customers buy technology as a service and pay monthly for their usage. We maintain the infrastructure, install the software, manage the services, and provide 24 x 7 user support. This approach allows our customers to focus on building their business while avoiding the distractions, risks and unpredictable expenses associated with traditional in-house systems.\xa0Since our launch in 1999 the goal of Proxios has always been to deliver turnkey solutions and responsive support for a predictable price. ['', 'What we can offer a Senior HPC Engineer:', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0An opportunity to work with our collaborative research team on novel work that will revolutionize modern-day mobile autonomy as we know it.', 'Key Skills: High-Performance Computing, HPC, C++11, C++14, C++17, OpenMP, MPI, CUDA, GPU, GPGPU, OpenCL, Parallel Programming, Parallelism, Heterogeneous Computing, Software Architecture. x86, VTK, Computer Architecture', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A culture of openness and collaboration – we are all working together under a shared vision.', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0A great location in downtown Boston', '·\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0\xa0Excellent benefits and competitive salaries', "We are looking for a Senior Software Engineer - HPC (Parallel Computing, CUDA, Optimization) to join an industry-leading autonomous systems company that is shaping the future of automated mobility by leveraging the power of artificial intelligence. With the next level of automated/autonomous technology comes significantly more software-enabled features, demanding a rampant increase in computing power and high-speed, low-latency data transmission. As leaders in high-speed sensing and networking systems in vehicles, we're looking to expand our Autonomous Mobility team to develop and commercialize the solutions that make tomorrow's mobility a reality today.", 'As a Senior HPC Software Engineer, the ideal candidate will be a seasoned modern C++ developer with significant experience using parallel programming technologies (OpenMP, MPI, CUDA).', 'We are looking for a Senior HPC Software Engineer to join our R&D team, implementing and designing cutting-edge algorithms and HPC software to accelerate the commercialization of self-driving vehicles across the world. If you have a passion for solving challenging technical problems and working within a world-leading autonomous systems organization, you will enjoy the work that we have for you here.', 'Senior Software Engineer - HPC (Parallel Computing, CUDA, Optimization)']

['', '- Work alongside hardware engineers in integrating, testing and debugging prototype systems', 'Employee Conduct', '- Comfortable working in embedded C/C++ and Python', 'Equal Employment Opportunity', '- Competency in Altium', 'Some projects you’ll be a part of:', '- Past work in products for marine or other harsh environments', 'The Company', 'Minimum Job Qualifications', '- Degree in electrical or computer engineering, or equivalent learning experience', 'If this job aligns with your passion and experience, we would love to hear from you!', '- Subsystem development in next generation platforms', 'Sofar is on a mission to connect humanity to our world’s oceans. We collect data from a global network of distributed sensors to create the best marine weather forecasts. With more ocean data we help maritime customers to save fuel and reduce emissions. Our hardware and software platforms give researchers vital tools to understand the impact of climate change on commercial fisheries and coral reefs. Our goal is to provide critical ocean data and insights to anyone who lives near, or makes a living on the two-thirds of our planet that is covered by water.', '- Solid understanding of common low level hardware peripherals and interfaces', 'All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without discrimination on the basis of race, color, religion, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, national origin, protected veteran status, disability, or any other factors prohibited by law.', '- Competency in node.js or other high level web languages/frameworks', '- Write embedded test firmware in C/C++ and fixture software in Python', '\ufeffHow to Apply', '- Integrated system testing, open ocean deployments, and the occasional throwing of things out of airplanes to see what breaks', 'It is the responsibility of every employee to contribute to a positive work environment through cooperative and professional interactions with co-workers, customers, and vendors.', '- Collaborate with engineering and product team to build and execute testing plans for design validation and production workflow', '- Advanced research and experiments with new and emerging technologies', '- Building new integrations for Spotter and Smart Mooring', 'The Position', 'Email your resume and a short cover letter explaining why you’re excited about the open position to\xa0recruiting@sofarocean.com\xa0and we will get back to you ASAP.', '- Past work in IoT, robotics, drones and/or automotive products', '- Schematic capture, PCB layout, prototyping and testing of fixture designs', 'We are looking for an experienced embedded engineer who is passionate about physical computing and electronics, and loves helping to bring designs from concept to product. This role will primarily be focused on scaling, production and testing, dfm. There will also be opportunities to contribute directly to new designs. You have broad experience in electrical engineering, writing embedded firmware, and working with Python. You’re excited to have the opportunity to grow your craft by collaborating with electrical and software design engineers on architecture and component selection. As part of a small and amazingly multi-disciplinary team including software engineers, mechanical and electrical engineers, product designers, scientists, generalists, and salespeople, you relish the opportunity to teach and learn from completely different domains.', '- 1+ years professional embedded systems experience', '- Ensure testability and productization is accounted for in new designs by participating in design reviews and whiteboard discussions with your teammates', 'Responsibilities', 'Bonus Points']

['', 'Various backend architectures (monolith, serverless, and microservice)AWS components (S3, lambda, kinesis datastreams, etc.)ETL pipelinesData warehousing, filtering and cleaningReactive analytics (eg: KPIs) and predictive analytics (eg: content recommendation)', 'AWS components (S3, lambda, kinesis datastreams, etc.)', "Piñata Farms is a team of 20 who have been responsible for some of the biggest cultural and tech successes of the last 10 years, spanning mobile, social, video, AR, gaming and music. We are backed by the top Silicon Valley VC's and some of the most influential strategic investors in media, tech, and pop culture. We have been quietly building this company for over a year and are currently in beta. Our app is a completely novel creative video platform and will be the next great cultural phenomenon -- in fact, you may have already seen some of our work racking up millions of views for Diplo, Marshmello, Kendrick Lamar’s team, Benny Blanco, Lil Dicky, the Jonas Bros…even getting 10 of these 🤣 from LeBron.\xa0", 'Vue.js frontend framework', 'Skills', 'Graph databases (neptune, Dgraph)', 'Search optimization (elastic search, etc.)', 'Graph databases (neptune, Dgraph)Tableau, databricks or similar analysis softwareVue.js frontend frameworkSearch optimization (elastic search, etc.)', 'Tableau, databricks or similar analysis software', 'Various backend architectures (monolith, serverless, and microservice)', 'Experience with:', 'The Piñata Farms engineering team organizational structure is flat. We own our data ingestion/cleaning/filtering pipeline, the machine learning model training pipeline, the app client, and the backend. We believe strongly that keeping these core components in-house allows us to communicate better and build a more robust product.', 'Backend and Full Stack Engineering', 'Data warehousing, filtering and cleaning', 'ETL pipelines', 'Engineering team', 'We are looking for a highly motivated and creative Full Stack growth engineer to play a core role in designing and developing various systems at Piñata Farms relating to user analytics, recommendation, and content understanding. You would be a critical part of the team as the product moves out of internal beta testing and becomes publicly available. This will include work on multiple different interfaces including but not limited to: designing systems to rapidly test features, analyze user behavior, work on recommendation systems, interface with various members of the product team to discuss findings and insights, and prototype new features.', 'Experienced with:', 'Preferred ', 'While we are staying confidential about our product until launch this Fall, our mission is driven from behavioral research into how today’s connected communities work. From our insider’s view of digital media and social communities, we’ve helped establish new norms and know what’s coming next. More than half of our team is dedicated to developing novel and proprietary computer vision technologies that differentiates us from the same old commoditized and shallow video apps. We’ve brought the best technologists and best people in pop culture together - PF will change the mobile video game forever.', 'Preferred Experience with:', 'B.S. or higher in computer science, electrical engineering, mathematics, or similar related field. Minimum 3 years of experience.', 'Reactive analytics (eg: KPIs) and predictive analytics (eg: content recommendation)', 'We are looking for the brightest minds eager to work on problems that are both technically and socially challenging. Your work on understanding user behavior and developing core insights into which part of the product works, which doesn’t, and which can be improved will drive key decisions at all layers in the company. Past expertise with consumer social products (Snapchat, Pinterest, Instagram, Musical.ly/TikTok, etc.) is a plus.\xa0\xa0']

['', '6-12+ month contract position ', 'Location - Remote/Waltham, MA ', 'Our client is looking for a Java Software Engineer that will design, develop, test, debug and implement more complex operating systems components, software tools, and utilities with full competency. Coordinates with users to determine requirements. Reviews systems under development and related documentation. Makes more complex modifications to existing software to fit specialized needs and configurations, and maintains program libraries and technical documentation. May coordinate activities of the project team and assist in monitoring project schedules and costs. The software engineer will be responsible for development work that supports our search micro-service applications. The tasks will range from maintaining the existing application and working on enhancements and new features by collaborating with team members including QA within an Agile scrum environment. Other tasks include generating ad-hoc batch reports as needed for analysis and research purposes.', 'This person should have five years of related experience. Strong object-oriented development skills to design, develop and maintain back-end functions and features in Java including knowledge of common design patterns, design principles and best practices. Experience with SQL and database (Oracle, MySql or SQLite), web-services (RESTful), XML related technologies. Experience with Apache Lucene is a plus. Standard development environment using Eclipse/IntelliJ, Jira, Maven, and GIT.\xa0']

['', '3 – 5 years recent experience in Java (3 – 5 years in C# with 1+ years in Java is ok)', 'Have written code that shows brilliance & imagination', 'In addition, the team at Windward is incredibly talented. You’ll be part of an A level team with work that will challenge you. You’ll be working on our document generation solution that, unlike other solutions that are slow, painful and limited, instead delivers a product that is enjoyable & easy.', 'Provide feedback on process & product improvements', 'Windward', 'Work with product teams to implement new features', 'Maintain existing code baseWork with product teams to implement new featuresProvide feedback on process & product improvements', 'SQL, XML/XPath, JSON, and/or OData experience (must be strong in at least one)', '3 – 5 years recent experience in Java (3 – 5 years in C# with 1+ years in Java is ok)Intelligence, positive attitude and a strong work ethic (critical)Have written code that shows brilliance & imaginationPreviously worked for a start-up or growth-stage companySQL, XML/XPath, JSON, and/or OData experience (must be strong in at least one)Preferably created Business Intelligence software and/or reporting/docgen of some kind', 'Maintain existing code base', 'At Windward you’ll be working with a team that is cooperative & motivated - and more importantly, one that is focused on doing their best for the customer. Employees at the company work well together and are there for each other.\xa0Windward is a place where you will enjoy working with your co-workers, others will step up to help you when needed, and your work matters – a lot.\xa0', 'Windward offers competitive pay, energetic, ambitious colleagues and the opportunity to work with customers & prospects from all parts of the globe.\xa0Benefits include flexible PTO, subsidized medical & dental insurance, vision insurance, 401K (with match), “quota blowout” celebrations, fun monthly events and a friendly, innovative work environment.\xa0For more info:\xa0https://www.windwardstudios.com/company/careers \xa0', 'We’re looking for a mid-level software developer.\xa0Our core offering is a reporting/document generation product in which templates are designed using Microsoft Word, Excel, and/or PowerPoint – which means we have truly made report design significantly easier.\xa0Our mantra is to be, by far, the easiest-to-use system available.', 'This is a “remote” opportunity – applications from outside of the area welcome!', 'Ideal Experience:\xa0', 'Intelligence, positive attitude and a strong work ethic (critical)', 'Previously worked for a start-up or growth-stage company', 'Preferably created Business Intelligence software and/or reporting/docgen of some kind', 'The core engine is written in Java and compiled using both Java (for the Java engine) and IKVM (for the .NET engine).\xa0The Office Add-In is written in C#/Forms.\xa0', '\xa0', 'Responsibilities:']

['', 'What you bring to Komodo:', 'Our people are the center of our success. We are a smart, supportive team with diverse perspectives and a shared passion for fixing what’s broken in healthcare. It’s fun, challenging and important. Join us!', 'At Komodo Health, our mission is to reduce the global burden of disease. Smarter use of data is essential to this mission. We combine the world’s most comprehensive view of patient encounters with innovative algorithms and decades of clinical expertise to power our Healthcare Map, the industry’s most precise view of the U.S. healthcare system. With the Healthcare Map as our foundation, we offer a suite of powerful software applications that deliver exceptional value to the industry.', 'The Life Science Services team’s mission is to support Life Science customers and products through custom applications of our healthcare map along with actionable insights that enable Komodo to meet our business goals.\xa0', 'Delivered high-value data analytics projects that existing data products cannot cover.', 'Keenly analytical mindset and the ability to solve complex problems with limited supervision.', 'High motivation, work ethic, and self-discipline to organize and complete tasks.', 'Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is required.Data processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery.Ability to work as part of a cross-functional collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.Strong business acumen demonstrated by a good understanding of how analytics insights tie into business goals.Keenly analytical mindset and the ability to solve complex problems with limited supervision.High motivation, work ethic, and self-discipline to organize and complete tasks.', 'Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate self-service solutions to non-technical internal stakeholders.', 'Data warehouse, modeling, and SQL experience such as Snowflake, Redshift, or BigQuery.', 'The Opportunity at Komodo Health', 'At Komodo Health, we don’t just accept differences — we celebrate it, we support it, and we thrive on it for the benefit of our employees, our products, and our community. Komodo Health is proud to be an equal opportunity workplace.', 'Python or Scala development, proficiency with at least one of them is required.', 'Data processing platforms such as Spark, Amazon EMR, Google DataProc, Hadoop/MapReduce, etc.', 'We are looking for a Data Engineer to help scale analytics pipelines and complex logic for complicated data projects that solve common customer use cases, while working cross-functionally with Data Scientists, Customer and Product teams.\xa0', 'Looking back on your first 12 months at Komodo Health, you will have…', 'Collaborated with data scientists to design, develop, and implement data data pipelines and data processing code for shared tooling.Worked with Product to help prototype new analytics offerings.Created automation systems and tools to configure, monitor, and orchestrate self-service solutions to non-technical internal stakeholders.Delivered high-value data analytics projects that existing data products cannot cover.Advocated for good engineering practices within the team via documentation and code reusability.', 'Collaborated with data scientists to design, develop, and implement data data pipelines and data processing code for shared tooling.', 'We Breathe Life Into Data', 'Strong business acumen demonstrated by a good understanding of how analytics insights tie into business goals.', 'Worked with Product to help prototype new analytics offerings.', 'Advocated for good engineering practices within the team via documentation and code reusability.', 'Ability to work as part of a cross-functional collaborative team in a fast-paced environment.']

', '• You have 8+ years of relevant experience. ', 'HPE makes Hybrid IT simple. HPE helps customers to design the right mix of Hybrid IT solutions to serve their unique needs. Our goal is to be one global diverse team that is representative of our customers, in an inclusive environment where we can continue to innovate and grow together. ", 'Find out more about us and follow us on: ', '\xa0 ', '• You will be responsible for verifying and implementing the detailed technical design solution to the problem as identified by the Project/Technical Manager. We are dedicated to equal employment opportunities regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, gender identity or Veteran status.\xa0', 'Refine attribution logic and apply media mix modeling techniques to measure effectiveness of marketing spend', "What you'll be doing:", 'Fluency in Python, R or similar scripting language', 'Experience in distributed data processing systems (Hive, Redshift, Presto, Snowflake, etc)', 'This is a fulltime role that can be held from one of our US hubs or remotely in the continental United States.', 'Degree in a quantitative field (Advanced degree preferred)3+ years relevant work experience supporting a Marketing functionFluency in Python, R or similar scripting languageProficiency in SQLExperience in distributed data processing systems (Hive, Redshift, Presto, Snowflake, etc)Breadth of knowledge around machine learning, statistical methods, and experiment design, including A/B testing, causal inference, and conversion lift experimentation methodsExcellent judgment and problem solving skillsA self-starting mindset along with strong communication and collaboration skills', 'Figma is the open design company founded in 2012 by Dylan Field and Evan Wallace. With our cloud-based screen design tool, teams achieve a shared understanding around design without worrying about syncing, exporting or installing software. Anyone involved in the product development process can share always up-to-date files with a link. That makes it easy to collaborate on the latest designs and prototypes and see their code attributes. Figma has simplified collaboration across the entire design process for thousands of companies like Microsoft, Slack and Uber and users, including designers, developers, product managers, marketers and others. To learn more and sign up for a free account visit\xa0www.figma.com.', '3+ years relevant work experience supporting a Marketing function', 'Degree in a quantitative field (Advanced degree preferred)', 'Develop and maintain datasets, KPIs, and reporting tools for the entire Marketing organization', 'Perform analysis and contribute to Lead Scoring and LTV models to improve ad targeting and ROAS', 'Refine attribution logic and apply media mix modeling techniques to measure effectiveness of marketing spendDesign and evaluate conversion lift experiments to optimize campaigns and measure their incremental impactPerform analysis and contribute to Lead Scoring and LTV models to improve ad targeting and ROASEvaluate and size the projected impact of new marketing strategies\xa0Develop and maintain datasets, KPIs, and reporting tools for the entire Marketing organization', 'About Figma', 'Breadth of knowledge around machine learning, statistical methods, and experiment design, including A/B testing, causal inference, and conversion lift experimentation methods', 'Design and evaluate conversion lift experiments to optimize campaigns and measure their incremental impact', 'Figma is adding to our team of passionate people who are revolutionizing the world of design. We are building a browser-based design tool that looks and feels as good as a native application and has all the additional power and advantages that come from being built upon the web platform. If you’re looking to work at a dynamic company who is building the future of design tools, welcome to Figma.', 'We are looking for an experienced Data Scientist to partner with our Marketing teams to accelerate growth at Figma. In this role, you will be responsible for building models to optimize our marketing efforts, uncovering insights to guide new strategies, and collaborating with a variety of cross functional peers to help leverage data throughout the organization. The ideal candidate will have a strong track record of executing analytical projects as well as building models to guide decision making.', 'Evaluate and size the projected impact of new marketing strategies\xa0']

['', 'Experience with software development in Linux OS.', 'Must understand distributed computing as you will be writing tests for & debugging parallel systems in this role.', ' Develops, modifies, and executes software test plans and automated test cases. Drives development of system-level validation software. Debugs software products through the use of systematic tests to develop, apply, and maintain quality standards for company products. Analyzes test results to ensure correct functionality. Maintains documentation of test results to assist in debugging and modification of software. Independently determines root causes of failures and recommends corrective action, working closely with development to drive resolution of bugs. Seeks opportunities to drive improved validation methodologies within the team. \xa0 The ideal candidate will have the following skills in addition to the qualifications listed below. Must have programming experience in both C and Python. Strong C programming experience required since, candidate will be writing unit tests to exercise C APIs as a primary function of this role. Must understand distributed computing as you will be writing tests for & debugging parallel systems in this role. Experience as a test developer creating and executing detailed test plans. Experience with software development in Linux OS. ['', 'Designs and develops methods, algorithms, and systems that apply machine learning technologies to support advanced signal processing concepts', 'Suggest, collect and synthesize requirements and create effective feature roadmap', 'Requirements', 'Strong experience with mathematical model tools and Python', 'Machine Learning Engineer of a Product Team', 'Experience in being part of a multi-disciplinary project team in research or development', 'Build advanced feature extraction pipelines', 'International Consulting Associates, Inc., is a dynamic, fast-growing company providing management and technical solutions to help federal agencies tackle some of their most pressing challenges. Our team of diverse professionals leverages analytical expertise, a culture of entrepreneurial innovation, and an obsession with problem-solving to deliver practical and timely results for our clients. Specializing in research and data analysis, data analytics, and technical advisory services, ICA is looking for talented, like-minded people to join our growing team.', 'Translating insights into business recommendations', 'Role', 'Designs and develops methods, algorithms, and systems that apply machine learning technologies to support advanced signal processing conceptsSuggest, collect and synthesize requirements and create effective feature roadmapBuild advanced feature extraction pipelinesAdapt standard machine learning methods to best exploit modern parallel environments (e.g. distributed clusters, multicore SMP, and GPU)Translating insights into business recommendationsStay current on published data mining, machine learning, and modeling techniques and competing technologies and share these findings with Scientists and Engineers in the organization', 'ICA is proud to have been selected as the preferred partner to help a federal health agency develop mission critical analytical tools. Many of these tools will leverage Machine Learning (ML) and Natural Language Processing (NLP) methods to identify safety signals in medical devices. This work is an opportunity to help improve the lives of millions of people using medical devices.', 'Experience supporting Natural Language Processing (NLP) modeling processes', 'BA/BS in Computer Science, Applied Math or related technical field', 'Familiarity with Scrum framework; Scrum certification is preferred', 'Any of the following AI/machine learning frameworks, statistical packages, and libraries: Tensorflow, Amazon Machine Learning, Apache Spark, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, NLTK, SQL, d3.js, as well as open source and other emerging technologies/frameworks', 'Stay current on published data mining, machine learning, and modeling techniques and competing technologies and share these findings with Scientists and Engineers in the organization', 'BA/BS in Computer Science, Applied Math or related technical field6+ years of experience in software engineering/data scienceExperience in being part of a multi-disciplinary project team in research or developmentStrong experience with mathematical model tools and PythonFamiliarity with Scrum framework; Scrum certification is preferredExperience with software development best practices including Version Control; we use GitAny of the following AI/machine learning frameworks, statistical packages, and libraries: Tensorflow, Amazon Machine Learning, Apache Spark, PyTorch, Scikit-learn, NLTK, SQL, d3.js, as well as open source and other emerging technologies/frameworksExperience supporting Natural Language Processing (NLP) modeling processesProgramming experience (SQL, Python/Javascript)This project requires personnel to obtain a Public Trust Clearance. To be eligible, candidates must be US Citizens or have lived in the US for 3 of the past 5 years.', '6+ years of experience in software engineering/data science', 'Programming experience (SQL, Python/Javascript)', 'Adapt standard machine learning methods to best exploit modern parallel environments (e.g. distributed clusters, multicore SMP, and GPU)', 'Experience with software development best practices including Version Control; we use Git', 'About Us', 'As a Machine Learning Engineer of a Product Team, you will build ML infrastructure to support machine learning models development and deployment, research and apply industry-leading MLops tools and techniques, participate in development and implementation of state-of-the-art machine learning algorithms for signal detection. You will be a part of a Scrum team of developers that includes data scientists and engineers, and full-stack developers. If you like learning new technologies, solving tough problems, and building systems that serve predictions of millions of data points, ICA could be the right place for you.\xa0', 'Responsibilities', 'This project requires personnel to obtain a Public Trust Clearance. To be eligible, candidates must be US Citizens or have lived in the US for 3 of the past 5 years.']

['', 'About Us:', 'Required Skills and Attributes:', 'Track record of successfully shipping systems software', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)', "Quality focused: you take pride in your codeC / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / workExcellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Education and Previous Positions:', 'BS or MS in Computer Science or a similar field (PhD a plus)Track record of successfully shipping systems softwareExperience with lower level systems programming in C or C++Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'As a Founding Engineer, you will design, implement, and deploy highly distributed, large-scale services. You will translate complex functional and technical requirements into detailed architecture and design. You will be very hands on, and work with others on the engineering team to manage day-to-day development activities, and participate in designs, design reviews, code reviews, and implementation. Our ideal candidate will be passionate about delivering high quality solutions to complex engineering problems, while working within a team.', 'Experience with lower level systems programming in C or C++', 'Previous experience building distributed databases or storage software', 'Quality focused: you take pride in your code', 'C / C++ programming guru: you are worshipped at school / work', "Very customer focused: love engineering that solves people's problems", 'Application complexity is shooting through the roof, and a large part of the reason is obsolescence of underlying data platforms that were built for centralized and simpler workloads. We are building the next generation data fabric for cloud native applications - where data mobility and portability is a central theme. This vision is matched by the passion of the founding team (with experience at Google, Facebook, and other internet scale companies), and we are recruiting our first engineers that will help establish the direction for the platform and establish the culture for the company.', 'Excellent algorithmic skills: you can tell O(n) from O(n2)']

', ' Commercial cloud (Azure) based data platform that can serve both Care Delivery Organization (CDO) level data warehouse / data mart needs as well as to feed, transform and store clinical and administrative data for the Optum Care Enterprise at a national level. This policy applies to all terms and conditions of employment, including recruiting, hiring, placement, promotion, termination, layoff, recall, transfer, leaves of absence, compensation and training. Kore1 expressly prohibits any form of workplace harassment based on race, color, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, national origin, age, genetic information, disability, or veteran status.Improper interference with the ability of Kore1's employees to perform their job duties may result in discipline up to and including discharge.", 'Develop creative solutions to structure, label, and access high-dimensional data to enable large-scale ML model development.', ' Competitive compensation & benefits package. Work with novel remote sensing data and algorithms in a modern technology stack. Your work will contribute to climate change mitigation and sustainable food production. Friendly + motivating company culture. ', 'Implement various optimized query and/or search algorithms that appropriately fit our data and use cases at a petabyte-scale.', "You're familiar with working with rapid development methodologies like SCRUM and/or Kanban/Kanplan, Continuous Integration, and Continuous Deployment.", 'Experience with remote sensing for agricultural systems, esp. hyperspectral.', 'Proven experience working with geospatial data tools such as GDAL, Postgres/PostGIS, cloud-optimized GeoTIFFs, HDF5, or others.', ' Architect and implement (in AWS/Azure) a cloud-based data mesh, data lake, and/or data warehouse utilizing domain-oriented database design and best practices for geospatial datasets. Design and build robust pipelines to ingest high-volume satellite data from external sources (e.g. Sentinel, MODIS). Implement various optimized query and/or search algorithms that appropriately fit our data and use cases at a petabyte-scale. Work with engineering and analytics teams to define new architectures and implement your solutions for unique image-based analytics products. ', 'About Kore1', 'Experience with machine learning engineering fundamentals and tools, e.g. MLFlow, Databricks, ONNX, etc.', ' Proven experience working with geospatial data tools such as GDAL, Postgres/PostGIS, cloud-optimized GeoTIFFs, HDF5, or others. Familiarity with common geospatial data structures and algorithms such as image pyramids, quadtrees, R-trees, discrete global grids, etc. Experience with machine learning engineering fundamentals and tools, e.g. MLFlow, Databricks, ONNX, etc. Experience with remote sensing for agricultural systems, esp. hyperspectral. ', 'Familiarity with common geospatial data structures and algorithms such as image pyramids, quadtrees, R-trees, discrete global grids, etc.', 'About You', "You're a conscientious, adaptable team-player that will work with others at Cloud Agronomics to define prototyping scope and product deliverables.", " You have excellent software engineering skills with the ability to architect, write, test, deploy, and maintain high-quality production code. You're passionate about testing and have significant experience utilizing testing frameworks such as PyTest. You're familiar with working with rapid development methodologies like SCRUM and/or Kanban/Kanplan, Continuous Integration, and Continuous Deployment. You're a conscientious, adaptable team-player that will work with others at Cloud Agronomics to define prototyping scope and product deliverables. ", 'Pluses', 'Competitive compensation & benefits package.', 'Architect and implement (in AWS/Azure) a cloud-based data mesh, data lake, and/or data warehouse utilizing domain-oriented database design and best practices for geospatial datasets.']
