Used for bloodstream infection Specific’s solution provides results 2 days sooner than existing methods, saving patients suffering from drug-resistant infection.', 'A degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Computational Biology or related field and at least 3 years of relevant industry experience.Proficiency with the following programming languages: C#, Python, and C/C++Substantial experience developing console and Desktop applications using WPF is required; QT is a plus; if you’re a web developer, this will not be the right role for you.Cloud experience required; AWS experience preferred.Knowledge database technologies is a plus – strong preference given to PostgreSQL and\xa0', 'User interface with an understanding of the customer use cases.', 'Knowledge database technologies is a plus – strong preference given to PostgreSQL and\xa0', 'Substantial experience developing console and Desktop applications using WPF is required; QT is a plus; if you’re a web developer, this will not be the right role for you.', 'The Company', 'Proficiency with the following programming languages: C#, Python, and C/C++', 'System administrator configurations and controls.', '\ufeffYou', 'A degree in Computer Science, Applied Mathematics, Statistics, Computational Biology or related field and at least 3 years of relevant industry experience.', 'Communication interfaces to management software.', 'Unit test and participation in design verification and regulatory documentation.', 'Instrument core control functionality including imaging, motion and workflow.', 'You will be a key contributor and critical to the success of the company. Our software development is very diverse, and you will have the opportunity to work on various technologies and develop various aspects to our solution. You have a proven track record of successfully, architecting, coding and testing to solve challenging real-world applications, preferably in devices and instruments. You should be excited by the prospect of working in a dynamic, entrepreneurial environment and the following qualifications:', 'The world is facing a medical crisis, bacteria are increasingly evolving resistance to even our strongest antibiotics. The problem is already very real and immediate; for example, bloodstream infection leading to sepsis is now responsible for more than half of all deaths in hospitals and is the most expensive condition treated in hospitals. Sepsis mortality rate increases >6% every hour without effective antibiotic treatment. Yet, despite the life and death urgency, and healthcare cost impacts, current methodologies require 3 days to determine the correct antibiotic.', 'This is the job for you if want to be where your ideas will be central to building a company and creating lifesaving products. This role is for a leading developer creating a transformative commercial medical system. The role includes defining the business layer and implementing the core functionality of Specific’s Reveal diagnostics instruments. This is\xa0not a web based\xa0full stack role but rather the role is to develop device, instrument, code from the from the user’s perspective down and from the firmware state machine layer up. The job spans development, test, documentation and iteration based on test results. Software development is the DNA of our company and core to our product developments. The main development roles include design and coding of:', 'Cloud experience required; AWS experience preferred.']

['', '4+ years of professional infrastructure engineering experience.', 'Engage in code reviews to ensure a high level of software excellence across the team.', '- Flexible and generous PTO + 13 holidays', "Office located in the Castro, close to great restaurants, gyms, coffee, and bars (we've temporarily transitioned to distributed work to do our part in protecting the health and safety of our team and our community and are monitoring the situation and will only return to the office when safe to do so). This enables our customers to determine if users on the other side of the screen are who they say they are.', '- 100% company paid premiums for medical, dental, & vision, 50% company paid premiums for dependents', 'Build additional infrastructure in alignment with modern best practices.', 'As a senior infrastructure engineer, you’ll be expected to leverage best practices to build highly-scalable, modern technology stacks. In addition to working directly with the founders, you’ll partner with the existing engineering and data scientists with backgrounds at Google, Snapchat, Airbnb and previous founding experience.', It is a versatile stack with many different parts, and we’re looking for engineers who relish multi-faceted and cross-domain challenges.', 'Experience working with Google App Engine, Terraform or other Google Cloud products is a bonus, but not required.', '\xa0']

['', 'Take the initiative to discover, diagnose and resolve performance bottlenecks at scale before our users notice.', 'Leverage billions of data points to drive your decisions, optimizing your features for fellow engineers, Roblox developers and Roblox players.', 'You Are:', 'Being the coolest adult kids know :)', 'Working with a world class team that will challenge, empower and stand by you', 'You Should Love:', 'In 2020, we were honored to be recognized as a Certified\xa0Great Place to Work®. Join the Roblox team where play rules and the possibilities are endless.', 'A leader by example: raising the technical bar for your team by identifying processes to improve, technologies to leverage and ways to mentor.', 'The impact that you can have at Roblox is powerful. We’re looking for someone who’s eager to take on a meaningful role in the success of Roblox on a massive scale. Someone who takes play seriously, but also isn’t afraid to have some fun either. They are intimately familiar with all of our technologies and exceptional problem solvers. We’re the one and only fastest-growing entertainment platform that lets anyone teach themselves how to code, publish, and monetize any experience imaginable—across any device—reaching millions of players across the globe.', '\xa0']

', 'Rincon Research Corporation seeks a self-starter to work in a multi-disciplinary R&D environment with similarly motivated electrical engineers, mathematicians, and computer scientists. ', 'TS/SCI clearance with Fully Scope Polygraph ', ' ', ' Rincon Research Corporation is an equal opportunity employer and considers qualified applicants for employment without regard to race, color, creed, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity and expression, age, disability, veteran status, or any other protected factor.', 'At Rincon Research Corporation, our primary business is innovating, developing, and fielding digital signal processing (DSP) products and services for the United States Defense and Intelligence Communities in support of national security. ', 'Ability to support multiple projects within the      organization ', 'Preferred Skills: ', 'Employer      contributions to RRC’s ESOP ', 'Employer      matching contributions to the company’s 401( k) Plan ', '\xa0 ', 'What are the primary responsibilities in the Software Engineer position? ['', 'Use and maintain demand-planning systems to create the best statistical forecast possible using established processes.', 'Ensure that the demand forecast is shared/received in the format, level of detail and timing required by all customers and supply chain partners, with documented assumptions, to achieve the various business objectives. ', 'Influential and charismatic, especially with decision makers and operational teams.', ' Responsible for monthly generation of the statistical baseline forecast for client and the client developed forecasting tool using SAS\\R programming. Expertise in statistical modeling techniques such as linear regression, logistic regression, tree models, cluster analysis, principal components, and feature creation, validation coupled with programming experience with SAS. Strong background in statistical concepts including regression analysis, factoring, clustering, decision trees, A/B testing and experimental design. Ability to write SAS/SQL statements to store, retrieve, manipulate, integrate, validate, and summarize data. Influence and collaborate with key partners in marketing, sales (field sales, corporate sales managers and directors) and finance and address input gaps as identified by forecast error, bias and volatility review and other means. Work with various cross-functional teams on projects such as new product launches, line extensions, product discontinuations, promotions and events. Demonstrate sound business decision making aligned with company goals. Ensure that the demand forecast is shared/received in the format, level of detail and timing required by all customers and supply chain partners, with documented assumptions, to achieve the various business objectives.  Monitor forecast bias and error metrics for process improvement opportunities. Manage statistical forecast exceptions by utilizing demand-planning exception reports to identify and fix potential issues. Use and maintain demand-planning systems to create the best statistical forecast possible using established processes. Assess the impact of market changes or significant variances in the forecast and recommend appropriate revisions and tactics. Analyze forecast model results and determine ways to improve statistical forecast as needed.  Work closely with corporate Business Analytics team to refine and improve forecast models. Use statistical methodology and programming techniques to develop analytical tools. Make recommendations to enhance business processes and identify opportunities to improve operational efficiencies. Work with affiliate teams to clean/correct demand history from prior month. Good written and spoken communications skills in English and thought-leadership skills. ['', "You have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field", "Take your career to new heights working with an amazing company doing next level work in the FinTech industry.\xa0At Amount we have a thriving culture and possess a truly entrepreneurial spirit.\xa0We value innovation and individual voices, we are committed to active inclusion and diversity, and we support each other's growth.\xa0\xa0Most importantly, we’re always ready to hustle!", 'Integrity: We work honestly and undivided in our commitment to make more possible.\xa0', 'Curious: We seek to understand the core of each problem, enabling us to find the right solution.\xa0', 'Teamwork: We make the best technology work for our clients by working together.\xa0', 'Respectful: We honor diversity, value inclusion, and create an environment of belonging for people of all backgrounds.\xa0', '3+ years of experience in software development', 'You have strong knowledge of computer science fundamentals', 'Eager: We are self-starters, fully engaged and committed to pushing great ideas forward quickly and responsibly.', 'Be a part of a strong culture of ownership, pragmatism, testing, teaching, but most importantly learning', 'Amount is a technology company focused on accelerating the world’s transition to digital financial services. We create technology experiences that help financial institutions better understand their customers while enabling them to live their best financial lives. We aim to make it easier for financial institutions to provide greater access and smarter tools, so everyone has the opportunity to tackle the financial challenges they face. Our technology is shaping the future of financial services by enabling our partners to better understand and serve their customers, and we are looking for talented team members to join us on the journey.\xa0', 'Risk Aware: We understand the impacts of each and every decision we make in our high risk industry.\xa0', "You enjoy building UIs with React, Typescript, and WebpackYou care about performance and understanding the impacts on customersYou are excited about refactoring and system design as we migrate to a service-based architecture and prepare for scaling and increasing data flowYou are motivated by innovation and take pride in improving the experience of our customersYou have strong knowledge of computer science fundamentalsYou thrive in a collaborative environment involving different stakeholders and subject matter experts and enjoys working with a diverse group of people with different expertiseYou have a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field3+ years of experience in software development", "Have a pet? Then, we're paws-itively certain you're going to love our My Pet Protection plans.", 'The Customer Application: The first experience the customer has with Amount. You’ll likely be looking for ways to optimize the funnel or improve the flow for potential or returning customers.The In Progress Dashboard: The customer’s next step in being approved for a product, where their identity, income and other factors are verified. You’ll likely be looking for ways to speed up the time between applying and issuing a decision.The Customer Dashboard: Where the customer spends all of their time after being approved for a product. You’ll likely be working on improving and introducing new self-service workflows, saving the customer and our specialists time.A variety of internal tools, including our Admin & Partner applications: You’ll work on saving the time of customer specialists, providing a great experience for our partners, and making internal processes more efficient.', 'You are excited about refactoring and system design as we migrate to a service-based architecture and prepare for scaling and increasing data flow', "Enjoy each other's company over virtual happy hours, yoga and meditation sessions, lunch and learns, team demo days, game nights, and more!", 'Take advantage of our comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision coverage, 401(k), parental leave, HSA match, and an Employee Assistance Program.', 'You are motivated by innovation and take pride in improving the experience of our customers', 'You care about performance and understanding the impacts on customers', "Enjoy each other's company over virtual happy hours, yoga and meditation sessions, lunch and learns, team demo days, game nights, and more!Take the time you need when you need it through our Flexible PTO policy.Save $$ on taxes by using our commuter and transit benefits! We also have a bike storage room available onsite.Take advantage of our comprehensive benefits package including medical, dental, vision coverage, 401(k), parental leave, HSA match, and an Employee Assistance Program.Interested in having a stake in Amount? We offer a meaningful equity program.Have a pet? Familiarity with the backend: You understand how parts of a system fit together—from the user interface to the data model. Experienced candidates should be familiar with relational database systems like Postgres or MySQL. Pragmatic and business-oriented: You care about the business impact of what you're building, and you prioritize projects accordingly. You're not just going after cool stuff—you understand the balance between craft, speed, and the bottom line. Put users first: You think critically about the implications of what you're building, and how it shapes real people's lives. ['', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).', 'Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).', 'Empower Your Future. Make a Difference.', 'Analyze healthcare trends. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.', 'What other skills/experience would be helpful to have?', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).Ability to take initiative and work independentlyDemonstrates curiosity/determination/iteration/innovation in using data to improve healthcare.Experience matching/linking multiple datasets to create cohesive, longitudinal analytic datasets.Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.Internal burning desire to succeed, yet a team player.', 'Ability to take initiative and work independently', 'Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). ['', 'Take the initiative to discover, diagnose and resolve performance bottlenecks at scale before our users notice.', 'Leverage billions of data points to drive your decisions, optimizing your features for fellow engineers, Roblox developers and Roblox players.', 'You Are:', 'Being the coolest adult kids know :)', 'Working with a world class team that will challenge, empower and stand by you', 'You Should Love:', 'In 2020, we were honored to be recognized as a Certified\xa0Great Place to Work®. We’ve fostered a company culture that empowers people to do the most defining work of their career in an environment that’s made up of the most passionate, team-oriented, visionary, crazy-smart people you’ll ever meet. Join the Roblox team where play rules and the possibilities are endless.', 'A leader by example: raising the technical bar for your team by identifying processes to improve, technologies to leverage and ways to mentor.', 'The impact that you can have at Roblox is powerful. We’re looking for someone who’s eager to take on a meaningful role in the success of Roblox on a massive scale. Someone who takes play seriously, but also isn’t afraid to have some fun either. Someone who’s ready to take Roblox—and their career—to the next level.', 'Comfortable designing, implementing, releasing and monitoring services at large scale, familiar with multiple languages/frameworks you can choose the right tool for the situation.', 'Platform engineers at Roblox are responsible for the infrastructure that allows our user base to grow quickly while enabling our engineering team to develop features rapidly. They are intimately familiar with all of our technologies and exceptional problem solvers. They understand the balance between agility and stability.', 'You Will:', 'Comfortable designing, implementing, releasing and monitoring services at large scale, familiar with multiple languages/frameworks you can choose the right tool for the situation.A leader by example: raising the technical bar for your team by identifying processes to improve, technologies to leverage and ways to mentor.Curious, passionate and determined to deliver world class software that’s used more than 1 billion hours a month, busting through any walls in your way.', 'Step up to design the interfaces and abstractions between services, building simple but highly leveraged distributed systems for the company.', 'WHY ROBLOX?', 'Senior Platform Engineer', 'Building features that improve the lives of over 150 million players a monthThe opportunity to take on massive responsibility and define your own path to successWorking with a world class team that will challenge, empower and stand by youBeing the coolest adult kids know :)', 'Curious, passionate and determined to deliver world class software that’s used more than 1 billion hours a month, busting through any walls in your way.', 'Step up to design the interfaces and abstractions between services, building simple but highly leveraged distributed systems for the company.Take the initiative to discover, diagnose and resolve performance bottlenecks at scale before our users notice.Leverage billions of data points to drive your decisions, optimizing your features for fellow engineers, Roblox developers and Roblox players.', 'Building features that improve the lives of over 150 million players a month', 'The opportunity to take on massive responsibility and define your own path to success', 'Roblox is ushering in the next generation of entertainment, allowing people to imagine, create, and play together in immersive, user-generated worlds. We’re the one and only fastest-growing entertainment platform that lets anyone teach themselves how to code, publish, and monetize any experience imaginable—across any device—reaching millions of players across the globe.', '\xa0']

['Key Responsibilities', 'Develop solutions that enable internal analysts to efficiently extract insights from data. They own the entire data pipeline starting with how we ingest data from the outside world, through the transformation of data into actionable insights, and finally the interfaces and APIs that our analysts and portfolio managers use to monetize that information. Throughout that process our data engineers work closely with investment professionals and researchers to design systems that answer some of the most challenging questions in the hedge fund industry. ', 'Prior work developing BI tooling and/or application development for data analytics ', 'Enterprise Data Engineers build pipelines that support datasets used by all investment teams and strategies across the firm. They manage the firm’s most critical data sets and focus on applying software development best practices to solve complex data challenges. The expectation is that the data engineer has sound programming skills, strong business acumen, and a strong interest in finance. ', 'Required Skills', 'Proficiency with Python, C++, Java or equivalent ', '\xa0 ', 'Key Responsibilities ', 'Take on an entrepreneurial mentality by building and selling your own ideas. We work in an evolving space and we expect you to help design our evolution by challenging the status quo and independently identifying opportunities to improve the entire data organization. ', 'Advanced technical communication skills ', 'Working knowledge of statistics, predictive analytics or machine learning techniques ', 'Enterprise Data Engineer ', 'Proficiency with RDBMS, NoSQL, distributed compute platforms such as Spark, Dask or Hadoop ', 'Develop solutions that enable internal analysts to efficiently extract insights from data. Take on an entrepreneurial mentality by building and selling your own ideas. We work in an evolving space and we expect you to help design our evolution by challenging the status quo and independently identifying opportunities to improve the entire data organization. ', 'New York, NY', 'A passion for working with data and developing software to address data processing challenges Proficiency with Python, C++, Java or equivalent Proficiency with RDBMS, NoSQL, distributed compute platforms such as Spark, Dask or Hadoop Prior experience building data pipelines from structured or unstructured data preferably including web crawlers Prior work developing BI tooling and/or application development for data analytics Advanced technical communication skills Working knowledge of statistics, predictive analytics or machine learning techniques Strong business acumen with prior experience in investment research or direct exposure to product or data science teams AND passionate about using data for investment decisions', 'A passion for working with data and developing software to address data processing challenges ', 'Prior experience building data pipelines from structured or unstructured data preferably including web crawlers ', 'Partner with internal analysts, quants and data scientists to design, develop, test and deploy solutions that answer fundamental questions about financial markets. ['', 'Their team is small and operates like a startup, with its own dev (FED and BED), product, UX, QA, analyst, ops, and marketing. The work you’ll do is key to their rapid growth.', 'Join our clinet to make a direct and immediate impact on hundreds of thousands of online merchants worldwide who use\xa0our clients stores, as well as their customers. You’ll develop end-to-end advanced ecommerce solutions and infrastructure, and shape the future of eCommerce on a global scale.', "What They're Looking For", 'team player', 'ownership', 'Release your code to production on a daily basis - we work in CI/ CD methods.', 'Own, test, and deploy your code. You should be a real\xa0team player, someone who\xa0cares\xa0about the team goals and putting in the work to realize them. Since we move quickly around here, you’ll need to have a positive approach towards\xa0change\xa0and be willing to\xa0adapt\xa0in a dynamic environment.', "Their fullstack developers are responsible for building store infrastructure and platforms that can easily be integrated with. They're also working with huge amounts of data on a massive scale, to serve our stores from multiple datacenters to every visitor on the planet.", 'change', 'Start from the kick-off with product and UX, and be on board all the way to deployment - this is a dev-centric environment in which you’ll be involved in all stages.Be responsible for the design and architectural aspects of your work.Release your code to production on a daily basis - we work in CI/ CD methods.Own, test, and deploy your code. To that end, They’re already delivering leading ecomm solutions to 500,000+ users all over the world, and we’re just getting started.', 'adapt', 'To fit this role, you need a solid backend background in a web environment, and to be passionate about what you do. ['You are tenaciously customer focused and thrive in a high-pressure environment.', 'Be Part of Something Bigger', 'About you…', 'Design, Build new RESTful APIs with Node.jsDesign, Build API adapters, bridging modern and legacy web services Build SPA in JavaScript, React.jsCreate unit, integration, security and functional testing across all code that meets or exceeds company standards.Debug integration issues and deploy hotfix patches as neededFocus on automation and continuous delivery (TDD, CICD)Build production-quality enterprise grade software that achieve target SLAs for scalability, reliability, and performance on schedule.', 'Create unit, integration, security and functional testing across all code that meets or exceeds company standards.', 'Expert level knowledge in Node.js and RESTful API design (Required)Expert level knowledge in JavaScript (Required)Advanced level knowledge in React.js (Required)Expert JavaScript Fundamentals + ES6 (Required)Experience with JEST or other Java Script test frameworkExperience with AWS API Gateway, AWS Lambda, AWS DynamoDB, AWS RDSExperience with modern web service architectureBasic understanding of Swagger (OpenAPI) REST API specification standardsExperience with Git, Atlassian stackExperience in automated unit testing, integration testing, and performance testing frameworks', 'You are creative at designing solutions to complex problems.', 'Build SPA in JavaScript, React.js', 'Power the PossibilitiesThe CDK Global technology team is looking for collaborative innovators who are passionate about making their mark on emerging enterprise software products. ['', 'Your Opportunity: ', 'This is an opportunity to work from home or a remote office in Portland, New York, Philadelphia or Austin.', 'location flexible in US', 'accessibility info', 'Must-have:', '· Experience operating databases hosted on cloud platforms', 'Do you want to work on databases that process hundreds of billions of transactions per month?\xa0', '· Investigating database tuning settings and query changes needed to improve performance, availability, and reliability.', 'eBay Inc. is an equal opportunity employer.\xa0 All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity, veteran status, and disability, or other legally protected status.\xa0 If you are unable to submit an application because of incompatible assistive technology or a disability, please contact us at talent@ebay.com.\xa0 We will make every effort to respond to your request for disability assistance as soon as possible.', 'EEO is the Law Poster', 'This website uses cookies to enhance your experience. By continuing to browse the site, you agree to our\xa0use of cookies', 'As a part of the Database team, you’ll be working with engineers who build and support our database environment which hosts thousands of\xa0 Oracle databases along with MySQL and NoSQL databases. NoSQL database platforms includes MongoDB, Couchbase, Cassandra, Foundation-DB for site facing applications along with TimesTen for Oracle Caching', '· Developing tools in Go/Python/Java to automate the operation (server and database provisioning, backups, fail-overs, monitoring, etc.)\xa0\xa0 of our database infrastructure to reduce possibilities for manual error and increase team efficiency.', 'Your Qualifications ', 'eBay i', 'Nice-to-have:', '· Assist in the creation, administration, and monitoring of Oracle, MySql and other NoSQL platforms.', 'What You’ll Do', '· Strong engineering mind set and dev-ops mentality', '· Build systems that help teams migrate from our database platform from VMs to Containerized environments.', 'Do you strive to build database systems that are highly reliable, performant, and easy to operate using the automation you write?\xa0', 'We believe in automation to increase reliability and reduce toil, so you’ll have the opportunity to use your programming skills and\xa0out-of-the-box thinking to create tools that automate remediation work flows not only on Oracle but other different platforms and set up\xa0advanced database monitoring.\xa0', '· Experience with Docker container deployments and administration', '· Proficiency using Perl/Python', 'Core Technology (CT) is a global team responsible for the end-to-end eBay technology platform. This platform runs our entire infrastructure and all the services that come together to form ebay.com.', 'EEO is the Law Poster Supplement', '· Experience with configuration management tools like Ansible, Salt, Puppet or other', '· Knowledge of handling distributed systems.', '· 4+ years of experience supporting database systems or in system administration roles.', '· Proficiency using Go and/or Java to automate system-level tasks', 'View our privacy policy', 'For more information see:', '· Experience using Kubernetes managed databases', 'About the Team:', '· Partner with internal development teams on datastore selection, schema design, query optimization, Tuning opportunities and\xa0\xa0 monitor database capacity.', 'If you find these challenges exciting, we encourage you to apply.\xa0', '· Real-world experience administering Oracle and MySQL and at least one industry popular nosql database in production.', 'View our accessibility info', 'You’ll be involved in solving world class one of a kind issues and provide consulting to application teams on how to scale their application better.']

['', 'Collaborate closely with all engineering teams to ensure consistency in understanding of technical requirements and overall work quality ', 'Own functionality and scalability features by taking responsibility from inception to deployment and customer integration ', 'Responsibilities: ', 'Ability to work full-stack and familiarity with React and GraphQL ', ' ', "Our client is the market leader in institutional-grade cryptocurrency investment services providing security, compliance, and custodial solutions for blockchain-based currencies. They are the world's largest processor of on-chain bitcoin transactions, processing 20% of all global Bitcoin transactions, and $15 billion per month across all cryptocurrencies. The company has over $2 billion in assets in wallet, and a customer base that includes the world's largest cryptocurrency exchanges and spans more than 50 countries. ", 'Understanding of and experience working in the financial industry Understanding of and strong interest in cryptocurrencies and blockchain Familiarity with any of the following: digital wallets, clearing and settlement, lending, trading, accounting systems, etc. Ability to work full-stack and familiarity with React and GraphQL Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes Experience with large-scale, real-time, and distributed applications ', 'Understanding of and experience working in the financial industry ', 'Familiarity with Docker and Kubernetes ', 'Strong experience with SQL databases like MySQL or Postgres ', 'Great with unit and functional testing and debugging ', 'Design and build strong, resilient, and robust APIs, libraries, and services to power our financial services: clearing and settlement, digital asset lending, liquidity Own functionality and scalability features by taking responsibility from inception to deployment and customer integration Expose and document functionality to the UI, third-party developers, and our internal and external tooling Collaborate closely with all engineering teams to ensure consistency in understanding of technical requirements and overall work quality Provide mentorship to your peers in the broader engineering team through code reviews and education on best practices ', 'Required', 'Compensation circa $200,000 + equity', 'Confident with RESTful API design ', 'Skills & Experience: ', 'Design and build strong, resilient, and robust APIs, libraries, and services to power our financial services: clearing and settlement, digital asset lending, liquidity ', 'They are looking for a Senior Software Engineer who will join their Engineering Team and help us build new features and applications for our enterprise clients. Our client processes a significant amount of cryptocurrency transactions so our applications need to be fast, accurate, scalable, and secure. Our integrated platforms interact with a number of exchanges, agencies, and governments around the world, and we use the best technology the industry offers to build them. ', 'Expose and document functionality to the UI, third-party developers, and our internal and external tooling ', 'Experience in Git/GitHub and branching methodologies, code review tools, CI tools, etc. ', 'Familiarity with any of the following: digital wallets, clearing and settlement, lending, trading, accounting systems, etc. ', 'Great at algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis ', 'Understanding of and strong interest in cryptocurrencies and blockchain ', 'Experience with large-scale, real-time, and distributed applications ', 'Bachelor’s degree in computer science, applied mathematics, or another technical discipline from a top university ', 'Nice to have', 'At least 5 years of back-end, server-side software development ', 'Remote work is possible for candidates with 10+ years of experience ', 'Strong experience with server-side languages like Golang, TypeScript/Node.JS, Java, etc. ', 'Experience with microservices and service-oriented architectures ', 'At least 5 years of back-end, server-side software development Strong experience with server-side languages like Golang, TypeScript/Node.JS, Java, etc. Strong experience with SQL databases like MySQL or Postgres Confident with RESTful API design Great with unit and functional testing and debugging Experience with microservices and service-oriented architectures Experience in Git/GitHub and branching methodologies, code review tools, CI tools, etc. Bachelor’s degree in computer science, applied mathematics, or another technical discipline from a top university Great at algorithm design, problem solving, and complexity analysis ', 'Provide mentorship to your peers in the broader engineering team through code reviews and education on best practices ', 'Responsibilities:']

['', 'Here at Change Healthcare, we’re using our influence to drive positive changes across the industry, and we want motivated and passionate people like you to help us continue to bring new and innovative ideas to life.If you’re ready to embrace your passion and do what you love with a company that’s committed to supporting your future, then you belong at Change Healthcare.', 'Healthcare billing and/or clinical data experience highly desirable (but not necessary).', 'Ability to summarize complex insights in plain English (for eventual consumption by the business and/or customers).', 'Empower Your Future. ', 'Transforming the future of healthcare isn’t something we take lightly. Understand drivers for health & wellness for both individuals and the health ecosystem at large. Use this understanding to help create predictive models projecting future healthcare conditions, outcomes and economics.Effective collaborator (within CHC and with customers). ', 'EEO is the Law', 'Ability to interpret abstract concepts to developer compelling insight, while ensuring their statistical validity.', 'Overview Of Position', " Minimum 6 years of experience in Data Solutions Field or related area. ['', 'We are seeking talented engineers skilled in the art of integration who understand the Agile mindset and Site Reliability Engineering philosophies, yet, not constrained by how “things are usually done; and are willing to decompose and reinvent systems, processes, and tools. We are looking for passionate engineers to build some of the largest compute services on the planet; if you possess that rare mix of depth in Development, Operations, Networking, and Systems Engineering then we are waiting for your application.', '\uf0b7 Experience in configuration management and infrastructure provisioning', '\uf0b7 Experience in designing, analyzing, and troubleshooting large-scale distributed systems', 'Qualifications', '\uf0b7 Experience with AWS Tools', 'Hope is not a strategy. Engineering solutions to design, build, and maintain efficient large-scale systems is a true strategy, and a good one. Site Reliability Engineering is an engineering discipline that combines software and systems engineering to build and run large-scale massively distributed, fault-tolerant systems. Practices such as limiting time spent on operational work, blameless postmortems and proactive identification of potential outages factor into iterative improvement that is key to both product quality and interesting and dynamic day-to-day work. Our culture of diversity, intellectual curiosity, problem solving and openness is key to our success. Our organization brings together people with a wide variety of backgrounds, experiences and perspectives. We encourage our teams to collaborate, think big and take risks in a blame-free environment. We promote self-direction to work on meaningful projects, while we also strive to create an environment that provides the support and mentorship needed to learn and grow.', '\uf0b7 Programming in Python and Linux', "We are proud to be our engineers; 'engineers' and love voiding warranties by taking things apart so we can rebuild them.", 'We use next-generation technology and alpha-driven strategies to transform the global economy. We tackle some of the toughest problems in the industry by pushing ourselves to be the best again and again. It’s demanding work for the brightest minds, but we wouldn’t have it any other way.', "\uf0b7 Bachelor's or Master's Degree in Computer Science or Computer Engineering"]

['', 'Required:', 'Plusses:\uf0b7 Amazon Redshift\uf0b7 Hadoop\uf0b7 Prior experience as a front-end, back-end, or full-stack web developer\uf0b7 Javascript / NodeJS\uf0b7 Python Django/Flask', 'What’s the Job?', 'Who Are We?', 'Data Product Engineer', 'Required:\uf0b7 3+ Years professional experience with Python and Bash\uf0b7 Python data structures and best practices\uf0b7 Professional experience with a SQL-based database, such as MySQL\uf0b7 Writes organized code with appropriate exception handling and logging\uf0b7 Understanding of HTTP network requests and responses\uf0b7 Understanding of HTML, XML, and JSON formats\uf0b7 Debugging experience\uf0b7 Ability to write technical documentation and comment code\uf0b7 Ability to write test suites and set up automation environments\uf0b7 Bash scripting\uf0b7 AWS and Linux (Ubuntu/CentOS) ', 'Who Are We?We are an investment firm based in New York, NY. ['', 'Take the initiative to discover, diagnose and resolve performance bottlenecks at scale before our users notice.', 'Leverage billions of data points to drive your decisions, optimizing your features for fellow engineers, Roblox developers and Roblox players.', 'You Are:', 'Being the coolest adult kids know :)', 'Working with a world class team that will challenge, empower and stand by you', 'You Should Love:', 'In 2020, we were honored to be recognized as a Certified\xa0Great Place to Work®. We’ve fostered a company culture that empowers people to do the most defining work of their career in an environment that’s made up of the most passionate, team-oriented, visionary, crazy-smart people you’ll ever meet. Join the Roblox team where play rules and the possibilities are endless.', 'A leader by example: raising the technical bar for your team by identifying processes to improve, technologies to leverage and ways to mentor.', 'The impact that you can have at Roblox is powerful. We’re looking for someone who’s eager to take on a meaningful role in the success of Roblox on a massive scale. Someone who takes play seriously, but also isn’t afraid to have some fun either. Someone who’s ready to take Roblox—and their career—to the next level.', 'Comfortable designing, implementing, releasing and monitoring services at large scale, familiar with multiple languages/frameworks you can choose the right tool for the situation.', 'Platform engineers at Roblox are responsible for the infrastructure that allows our user base to grow quickly while enabling our engineering team to develop features rapidly. We’re the one and only fastest-growing entertainment platform that lets anyone teach themselves how to code, publish, and monetize any experience imaginable—across any device—reaching millions of players across the globe.', '\xa0']
